Original: Lann:That makes zero sense and kind of freaks me out, but Tama, I'mimpressed!
Dialogue: That makes zero sense and kind of freaks me out, but Tama, I'm impressed!
trans: 这毫无意义，有点吓到我了，但是 Tama，我印象深刻！

Original: Lann:Dude! You got it. Say no more! Rest yourself silly.
Dialogue: Dude! You got it. Say no more! Rest yourself silly.

Original: Tama:Yes the-sir!
Dialogue: Yes the-sir!

Original: Reynn:Thanks, Tama. We really owe you one.
Dialogue: Thanks, Tama. We really owe you one.

Original: Lann:Hey. Who's that?
Dialogue: Hey. Who's that?

Original: Enna Kros:Oh! If you mean our new guest, she claims to have gotten herself lost.
Dialogue: Oh! If you mean our new guest, she claims to have gotten herself lost.

Original: Lann:Uh, okay!
Dialogue: Uh, okay!

Original: Enna Kros:The real question is how she got here from the outside world when it's no easy trick.
Dialogue: The real question is how she got here from the outside world when it's no easy trick.
trans: 真正的问题是，当这不是一件容易的事时，她是如何从外面的世界来到这里的。

Original: Reynn:So...she's over at North Promenade.
Dialogue: So...she's over at North Promenade.

Original: Reynn:Oh wow. She's so tiny! Is she a... What's the word again? Lilikin?
Dialogue: Oh wow. She's so tiny! Is she a... What's the word again? Lilikin?

Original: ???:Choco-boco-lina! ...Oh!
Dialogue: Choco-boco-lina! ...Oh!

Original: Lann:Uh, good. More or less.
Dialogue: Uh, good. More or less.

Original: ???:You know, what a nice, quiet place.
Dialogue: You know, what a nice, quiet place.
trans: 你知道，多么美好、安静的地方。

Original: Reynn:Oh, uh...
Dialogue: Oh, uh...

Original: Tama:So who are the-you?
Dialogue: So who are the-you?

Original: Chocolatte:Oh! You can call me Chocolatte.
Dialogue: Oh! You can call me Chocolatte.

Original: Chocolatte:I seem to have washed up here like a soggy yellow feather in a storm.
Dialogue: I seem to have washed up here like a soggy yellow feather in a storm.
trans: 我似乎像暴风雨中浸湿的黄色羽毛一样被冲上了这里。

Original: Chocolatte:I do have this funny knack for winding up in strange places.
Dialogue: I do have this funny knack for winding up in strange places.
trans: 我确实有这种有趣的本领，可以在陌生的地方结束。

Original: Reynn:Uh, cool...
Dialogue: Uh, cool...

Original: Chocolatte:Oh, right!
Dialogue: Oh, right!

Original: Lann:Whoa, slow down! What kind of operation is this?
Dialogue: Whoa, slow down! What kind of operation is this?

Original: Chocolatte:It's called a shop, dear.
Dialogue: It's called a shop, dear.

Original: Reynn:So hey, are you ready to head back to Grymoire?
Dialogue: So hey, are you ready to head back to Grymoire?
trans: 所以，嘿，你准备好回 Grymoire 了吗？

Original: Serafie:Well, you had it coming.
Dialogue: Well, you had it coming.

Original: Tama:Well, I don't remember you the-raising me at all!
Dialogue: Well, I don't remember you the-raising me at all!
trans: 好吧，我根本不记得你抚养过我！

Original: Reynn:Who's this?
Dialogue: Who's this?

Original: Serafie:Oh, hi. I'm just your adorable local wind pixie, aka Serafie.
Dialogue: Oh, hi. I'm just your adorable local wind pixie, aka Serafie.

Original: Serafie:Hoarding. Why do you think I'm here?
Dialogue: Hoarding. Why do you think I'm here?

Original: Reynn:Well...we're still working on it.
Dialogue: Well...we're still working on it.

Original: Serafie:Uh-huh. You'll have scads of them before long. You're gonna need a place to unload.
Dialogue: Uh-huh. You'll have scads of them before long. You're gonna need a place to unload.

Original: Lann:Yeah, they are kind of bulky.
Dialogue: Yeah, they are kind of bulky.

Original: Serafie:Well, who's got you covered? This pixie right here.
Dialogue: Well, who's got you covered? This pixie right here.

Original: Reynn:I'm not sure I caught every single word, but I guess..."I Agree"?
Dialogue: I'm not sure I caught every single word, but I guess..."I Agree"?
trans: 我不确定我是否听清了每一个字，但我想……“我同意”？

Original: Tama:Serafie's kind of a "special" the-case.
Dialogue: Serafie's kind of a "special" the-case.

Original: Enna Kros:Anyway, I think you should be able to manage on your own from here.
Dialogue: Anyway, I think you should be able to manage on your own from here.
trans: 无论如何，我认为您应该能够从这里自行管理。

Original: Tama:You mean you're the-leaving us?
Dialogue: You mean you're the-leaving us?

Original: Enna Kros:Yes. You handle things now.
Dialogue: Yes. You handle things now.

Original: Tama:Oh! Okay, I the-will!
Dialogue: Oh! Okay, I the-will!

Original: Reynn:Huh? B-but where are you going now?
Dialogue: Huh? B-but where are you going now?

Original: Enna Kros:Oh, well... Somewhere else, of course.
Dialogue: Oh, well... Somewhere else, of course.
trans: 哦，好吧……当然是在别的地方。

Original: Reynn:Yeah, that's not exactly very helpful. Look, we really need to ask you so many things!
Dialogue: Yeah, that's not exactly very helpful. Look, we really need to ask you so many things!

Original: Enna Kros:No no, you'll figure it out. I can't do everything for you now.
Dialogue: No no, you'll figure it out. I can't do everything for you now.

Original: Reynn:Everything? But you've barely done anything.
Dialogue: Everything? But you've barely done anything.

Original: Enna Kros:Besides, every world has its own rules. Like water dousing fire, and light banishing darkness.
Dialogue: Besides, every world has its own rules. Like water dousing fire, and light banishing darkness.
trans: 此外，每个世界都有自己的规则。

Original: Lann:Uhh, I think that's just called "science"?
Dialogue: Uhh, I think that's just called "science"?
trans: 呃，我认为那只是所谓的“科学”？

Original: Enna Kros:Well, I design mine to be so completely unbreakable that even I can't undo them.
Dialogue: Well, I design mine to be so completely unbreakable that even I can't undo them.
trans: 好吧，我设计的是完全牢不可破的，即使我也无法撤消它们。

Original: Lann:Undo what?
Dialogue: Undo what?

Original: Enna Kros:The rules.
Dialogue: The rules.

Original: Lann:Ugh... You're bad at explaining.
Dialogue: Ugh... You're bad at explaining.

Original: Reynn:You're saying you can't help because that violates the rules of the world or something?
Dialogue: You're saying you can't help because that violates the rules of the world or something?
trans: 你是说你帮不上忙，因为那违反了世界规则之类的？

Original: Lann:But whyisthat? I mean, come on. Just who do you think you are?
Dialogue: But why is that? I mean, come on. Just who do you think you are?

Original: Enna Kros:Me? Oh, well...
Dialogue: Me? Oh, well...

Original: Lann:Dude.
Dialogue: Dude.

Original: Reynn:I guess we can'tnecessarilyrule it out. But for somebody calling the cosmic shots...
Dialogue: I guess we can't necessarily rule it out. But for somebody calling the cosmic shots...
trans: 我想我们不能一定排除它。

Original: Serafie:Well, that's Enna Kros for you, so get used to it.
Dialogue: Well, that's Enna Kros for you, so get used to it.
trans: 好吧，那是给你的 Enna Kros，所以习惯吧。

Original: Lann:So...she really is god?
Dialogue: So...she really is god?

Original: Serafie:Beats me. Enna Kros is Enna Kros, wouldn't you say?
Dialogue: Beats me. Enna Kros is Enna Kros, wouldn't you say?

Original: Tama:Pretty the-much.
Dialogue: Pretty the-much.

Original: Reynn:Uh, thanks for clearing it up.
Dialogue: Uh, thanks for clearing it up.

Original: Lann:Well, that certainly cost us a chunk of time.
Dialogue: Well, that certainly cost us a chunk of time.
trans: 好吧，这肯定花费了我们很多时间。

Original: Reynn:And whose fault is that?
Dialogue: And whose fault is that?

Original: Lann:Oh, uh...yeah! I want names!
Dialogue: Oh, uh...yeah! I want names!

Original: Reynn:Lann! Don't touch it this time.
Dialogue: Lann! Don't touch it this time.

Original: Lann:I know, I know. But...could we see all this stuff before?
Dialogue: I know, I know. But...could we see all this stuff before?

Original: Tama:Now that you've fought that thing the-once, you can see all its information.
Dialogue: Now that you've fought that thing the-once, you can see all its information.
trans: 现在你已经和那个东西打过一次了，你可以看到它的所有信息。

Original: Reynn:Got it.
Dialogue: Got it.

Original: Tama:Yup!Verygood thing to keep in the-mind,Lann.
Dialogue: Yup! Very good thing to keep in the-mind, Lann.

Original: Lann:Uh, why are you repeating it? And just for my sake?
Dialogue: Uh, why are you repeating it? And just for my sake?

Original: ???:Chapter 2 - Foretold by Prophecy
Dialogue: Chapter 2 - Foretold by Prophecy
trans: 第 2 章 - 预言的预言

Original: Lann:Hey Sis, is that a town over there at the end of the bridge?
Dialogue: Hey Sis, is that a town over there at the end of the bridge?
trans: 嘿，姐姐，桥的尽头是那边的小镇吗？

Original: Reynn:Yeah. And I don't know why, but something about it "takes me back"...
Dialogue: Yeah. And I don't know why, but something about it "takes me back"...

Original: Reynn:So, uh...you think we're supposed to get on?
Dialogue: So, uh...you think we're supposed to get on?
trans: 所以，呃……你认为我们应该继续吗？

Original: Tama:Abso-the-lutely! All the-aboard!
Dialogue: Abso-the-lutely! All the-aboard!

Original: Lann:Oh, dude!
Dialogue: Oh, dude!

Original: Lann:Oh. Hey Sis, let's park it here.
Dialogue: Oh. Hey Sis, let's park it here.

Original: Lann:Uh, hi...
Dialogue: Uh, hi...

Original: Lann:They're so tiny.
Dialogue: They're so tiny.

Original: ???:Whoa, pluck my needles! I don't knowhowlong it's been since we've had new passengers.
Dialogue: Whoa, pluck my needles! I don't know how long it's been since we've had new passengers.

Original: Cactuar Conductor:Right. Tickets, please!
Dialogue: Right. Tickets, please!

Original: Lann:Ohhh!
Dialogue: Ohhh!

Original: Reynn:A Mirage?
Dialogue: A Mirage?

Original: Lann:What? It talks?!
Dialogue: What? It talks?!

Original: Cactuar Conductor:Oh, I indeedily needilyama Mirage, but I'm also the train conductor, sooo... tickets, please!
Dialogue: Oh, I indeedily needily am a Mirage, but I'm also the train conductor, sooo... tickets, please!
trans: 哦，我确实是海市蜃楼，但我也是火车售票员，sooo...票，求求你！

Original: Lann:The conductor? Well, all right... If Tama can talk, then why not?
Dialogue: The conductor? Well, all right... If Tama can talk, then why not?

Original: Reynn:But, the train tickets that we need
Dialogue: But, the train tickets that we need—
trans: 但是，我们需要的火车票——

Original: Tama:Are right the-here!
Dialogue: Are right the-here!

Original: Lann:Right the-how?
Dialogue: Right the-how?

Original: Cactuar Conductor:Wow! Semi-lifetime passes, eh? Haven't feasted my eyes on one of these in a swell spell.
Dialogue: Wow! Semi-lifetime passes, eh? Haven't feasted my eyes on one of these in a swell spell.

Original: Reynn:Where did those tickets come from?
Dialogue: Where did those tickets come from?

Original: Tama:Enna Kros made sure I was provided with everything we could ever the-need. Yup-the-yup!
Dialogue: Enna Kros made sure I was provided with everything we could ever the-need. Yup-the-yup!
trans: Enna Kros 确保我得到了我们可能需要的一切。

Original: Reynn:Uh, okay then...
Dialogue: Uh, okay then...

Original: Lann:So why a "semi"-lifetime pass? And not a lifetime one?
Dialogue: So why a "semi"-lifetime pass? And not a lifetime one?
trans: 那么为什么要“半”终生通行证呢？

Original: Lann:Wow... This place rules!
Dialogue: Wow... This place rules!

Original: Reynn:Yeah, it's like something right out of a fantasy.
Dialogue: Yeah, it's like something right out of a fantasy.
trans: 是的，这就像是来自幻想的东西。

Original: Lann:Hey, Tama. Why don't you hitch a ride?
Dialogue: Hey, Tama. Why don't you hitch a ride?

Original: Tama:Roger the-dodger!
Dialogue: Roger the-dodger!

Original: Reynn:Oh, us? We're, uh...
Dialogue: Oh, us? We're, uh...

Original: Frightened Man:Ah! Mirages from the Bahamutian Army!
Dialogue: Ah! Mirages from the Bahamutian Army!

Original: Lann:Baha-moo? What's...a Bahamoo?
Dialogue: Baha-moo? What's...a Bahamoo?

Original: Passerby:Well, the Bahamutian Federation has a whole army of Mirages in their employ.
Dialogue: Well, the Bahamutian Federation has a whole army of Mirages in their employ.
trans: 好吧，Bahamutian Federation 拥有一整支 Mirages 军队。

Original: Reynn:Huh? Someone's made a whole army out of them?
Dialogue: Huh? Someone's made a whole army out of them?

Original: Lann:Sounds just fine by me. Line 'em up nice and neat for us, so we can round 'em up!
Dialogue: Sounds just fine by me. Line 'em up nice and neat for us, so we can round 'em up!

Original: Lann:All right you Baha-moos, what's your beef? Huh?!
Dialogue: All right you Baha-moos, what's your beef? Huh?!

Original: Tama:You the-make it sound like they'remadeof beef.
Dialogue: You the-make it sound like they're made of beef.
trans: 你让它们听起来像是用牛肉做的。

Original: Reynn:Ugh... Yeah, Lann. Don't you know what's at "steak"?
Dialogue: Ugh... Yeah, Lann. Don't you know what's at "steak"?

Original: Lann:Whoa! What the... What just happened? Why wasn't I able to imprism that Mirage?
Dialogue: Whoa! What the... What just happened? Why wasn't I able to imprism that Mirage?

Original: Tama:Didn't you see the light the-surrounding it? That means it's the-beholden to another keeper.
Dialogue: Didn't you see the light the-surrounding it? That means it's the-beholden to another keeper.
trans: 你没看到它周围的光吗？

Original: Lann:Be-what? B.O.? They smell?
Dialogue: Be-what? B.O.? They smell?

Original: Tama:UGH! No! What I mean is, the Mirage already has another the-master.
Dialogue: UGH! No! What I mean is, the Mirage already has another the-master.

Original: Lann:Ugh! Fire whoever wrotethatlittle hook in.
Dialogue: Ugh! Fire whoever wrote that little hook in.

Original: Reynn:Lann! Ix-nay on the fourth wall stuff!
Dialogue: Lann! Ix-nay on the fourth wall stuff!

Original: Lann:Oh! Whoops...
Dialogue: Oh! Whoops...

Original: Distrustful Man:Are they Bahamutian soldiers?
Dialogue: Are they Bahamutian soldiers?
trans: 他们是巴哈姆特士兵吗？

Original: Grateful Woman:But they drove the Mirages off for us.
Dialogue: But they drove the Mirages off for us.
trans: 但是他们为我们赶走了幻影。

Original: Amazed Woman:It's just like the prophecy, word for word!
Dialogue: It's just like the prophecy, word for word!

Original: Confused Man:But...which one?
Dialogue: But...which one?

Original: Fretful Woman:Well, weknowhow it ends...
Dialogue: Well, we know how it ends...
trans: 好吧，我们知道它是如何结束的......

Original: Passerby:Please. May I speak with you?
Dialogue: Please. May I speak with you?

Original: Reynn:Oh, sure.
Dialogue: Oh, sure.

Original: Passerby:The two of youyou've traveled here from another world.
Dialogue: The two of you—you've traveled here from another world.
trans: 你们两个——你们是从另一个世界来到这里的。

Original: Reynn:Oh, well... I wouldn't... I mean...
Dialogue: Oh, well... I wouldn't... I mean...

Original: Lann:Actually, I think you're pretty much spot-on. And we're Mirage Keepers, too!
Dialogue: Actually, I think you're pretty much spot-on. And we're Mirage Keepers, too!
trans: 其实我觉得你说的很到位。

Original: Reynn:ButLann, don't tell her!
Dialogue: But—Lann, don't tell her!

Original: Lann:Why not? Face it, we're too awesome to try and hide it.
Dialogue: Why not? Face it, we're too awesome to try and hide it.

Original: Reynn:Lann, you don't even know what "exude" means.
Dialogue: Lann, you don't even know what "exude" means.
trans: 兰恩，你甚至不知道“散发”是什么意思。

Original: Passerby:There is...someone who would like to have a word with you. Could you possibly stop by Castle Cornelia?
Dialogue: There is...someone who would like to have a word with you. Could you possibly stop by Castle Cornelia?

Original: Lann:So let's find this Casa Cornelius place.
Dialogue: So let's find this Casa Cornelius place.
trans: 让我们找到这个 Casa Cornelius 的地方。

Original: Tama:Well, you've the-got the direction correct, even if the rest of that wascompletelyoff the-base.
Dialogue: Well, you've the-got the direction correct, even if the rest of that was completely off the-base.
trans: 好吧，你的方向是正确的，即使其余部分完全偏离了基地。

Original: Reynn:That woman must be important if she's inviting us to the castle...
Dialogue: That woman must be important if she's inviting us to the castle...
trans: 如果她邀请我们去城堡的话，那个女人一定很重要......

Original: Tama:Castle Cornelia is up the-near the top of the town.
Dialogue: Castle Cornelia is up the-near the top of the town.
trans: 科妮莉亚城堡位于小镇的顶端。

Original: Lann:Oh. Right! We should stop by.
Dialogue: Oh. Right! We should stop by.

Original: Lann:Wassup, guys! Nice armor.
Dialogue: Wassup, guys! Nice armor.

Original: Reynn:Leave them alone, please.
Dialogue: Leave them alone, please.

Original: Princess Sarah:Thank you for coming. Welcome to the kingdom of Cornelia. I am Princess Sarah.
Dialogue: Thank you for coming. Welcome to the kingdom of Cornelia. I am Princess Sarah.

Original: Lann:Wait, you're like, a princess?
Dialogue: Wait, you're like, a princess?

Original: Reynn:We had no idea!
Dialogue: We had no idea!

Original: Lann:I'm not royal!
Dialogue: I'm not royal!

Original: Reynn:Oh, and I'm his older sister, Reynn. It's an honor.
Dialogue: Oh, and I'm his older sister, Reynn. It's an honor.

Original: Princess Sarah:Please forgive the ruse. At first, I suspected that you might be agents sent here by Bahamut.
Dialogue: Please forgive the ruse. At first, I suspected that you might be agents sent here by Bahamut.

Original: Lann:Oh, I wouldn't say we werethatbrave. Really.
Dialogue: Oh, I wouldn't say we were that brave. Really.
trans: 哦，我不会说我们那么勇敢。

Original: Reynn:Stop, you're so modest.
Dialogue: Stop, you're so modest.

Original: Lann:Yeah, we're more the "instanding" types.
Dialogue: Yeah, we're more the "instanding" types.
trans: 是的，我们更像是“即时”类型。

Original: Tama:Hwah? I'm pretty the-sure that "instanding" isn't an actual the-word.
Dialogue: Hwah? I'm pretty the-sure that "instanding" isn't an actual the-word.

Original: Princess Sarah:Tee hee... Ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Tee hee... Ha ha ha!

Original: Reynn:Prophecies? Oh, that's right... I think I heard the townsfolk going on about some kind of prophecy too.
Dialogue: Prophecies? Oh, that's right... I think I heard the townsfolk going on about some kind of prophecy too.

Original: Princess Sarah:Oh, I am sorry. If you will permit me, I will explain it from the beginning.
Dialogue: Oh, I am sorry. If you will permit me, I will explain it from the beginning.

Original: Reynn:You mean like, that Mirage attack before?
Dialogue: You mean like, that Mirage attack before?
trans: 你的意思是，之前的 Mirage 攻击？

Original: Reynn:So where does this "prophecy" factor in?
Dialogue: So where does this "prophecy" factor in?
trans: 那么这个“预言”的因素在哪里呢？

Original: Princess Sarah:The Azure Prophecy speaks of a divergence.
Dialogue: The Azure Prophecy speaks of a divergence.

Original: Reynn:The Jiants may...wreak two futures?
Dialogue: The Jiants may...wreak two futures?
trans: Jiants 可能...破坏两个未来？

Original: Lann:"Reek", huh?
Dialogue: "Reek", huh?

Original: Tama:Wh-wh-what are you the-talking about? There's nothing the-wrong with the way I smell! You big the-dummy!
Dialogue: Wh-wh-what are you the-talking about? There's nothing the-wrong with the way I smell! You big the-dummy!

Original: Lann:Well, at least I'm dumber thanyou!
Dialogue: Well, at least I'm dumber than you!

Original: Reynn:I'm sorry, Your Highness. I'm afraid there's just no hope for them.
Dialogue: I'm sorry, Your Highness. I'm afraid there's just no hope for them.

Original: Princess Sarah:Oh. Uhh...
Dialogue: Oh. Uhh...

Original: Reynn:So, "the Jiants from the Hills"... As in Nine Wood Hills?
Dialogue: So, "the Jiants from the Hills"... As in Nine Wood Hills?
trans: 那么，“山上的剑客”……就像在九木山一样？

Original: Reynn:Um, do you mind if I ask you a slightly awkward question?
Dialogue: Um, do you mind if I ask you a slightly awkward question?
trans: 嗯，你介意我问你一个有点尴尬的问题吗？

Original: Princess Sarah:Most of the Mirages in Grymoirenot all, but certainly most of themare now firmly under the Federation's control.
Dialogue: Most of the Mirages in Grymoire—not all, but certainly most of them—are now firmly under the Federation's control.
trans: Grymoire 的大多数海市蜃楼——不是全部，但肯定是大部分——现在都牢牢地处于联邦的控制之下。

Original: Lann:Dude, they controlthatmany Mirages? Seriously?!
Dialogue: Dude, they control that many Mirages? Seriously?!
trans: 伙计，他们控制了那么多海市蜃楼？

Original: Princess Sarah:Y-yes! Uh, "dude."
Dialogue: Y-yes! Uh, "dude."

Original: Princess Sarah:King Brandelis's Herald lieutenants, known asSegwaridesandPellinore,
Dialogue: King Brandelis's Herald lieutenants, known as Segwarides and Pellinore,
trans: Brandelis 国王的先驱副官，被称为 Segwarides 和 Pellinore，

Original: Reynn:So there was a Queen of the Keepers? Sounds like she was pretty powerful.
Dialogue: So there was a Queen of the Keepers? Sounds like she was pretty powerful.
trans: 所以有一个守护者女王？

Original: Princess Sarah:Yes, but that was more than a century ago.
Dialogue: Yes, but that was more than a century ago.
trans: 是的，但那是一个多世纪以前的事了。

Original: Reynn:So...sorry for the string of dumb questions, but,
Dialogue: So...sorry for the string of dumb questions, but,
trans: 所以...很抱歉提出了一系列愚蠢的问题，但是，

Original: Princess Sarah:It mayseemwise... But you see, membership in the Federation involves following their laws, and adoption...of a heinous creed.
Dialogue: It may seem wise... But you see, membership in the Federation involves following their laws, and adoption...of a heinous creed.
trans: 这似乎是明智的......但你知道，加入联邦需要遵守他们的法律，并采纳......令人发指的信条。

Original: Reynn:That bad?
Dialogue: That bad?

Original: Princess Sarah:Yes. I beg you, see for yourselves. Once you have done so, well...you will understand.
Dialogue: Yes. I beg you, see for yourselves. Once you have done so, well...you will understand.

Original: Reynn:All right, then.
Dialogue: All right, then.

Original: Princess Sarah:Now then. May I ask what the two of you intend to do next?
Dialogue: Now then. May I ask what the two of you intend to do next?

Original: Lann:Well, whatever's going on out there, the only thing we can do right now is just keep rounding up more Mirages, am I right?
Dialogue: Well, whatever's going on out there, the only thing we can do right now is just keep rounding up more Mirages, am I right?
trans: 好吧，不管外面发生了什么，我们现在唯一能做的就是继续围捕更多的幻影，对吗？

Original: Reynn:Apparently, at one time we commanded a whole legion of them. But somehow, we lost them, along with our memories.
Dialogue: Apparently, at one time we commanded a whole legion of them. But somehow, we lost them, along with our memories.
trans: 显然，我们曾经指挥过他们的整个军团。

Original: Lann:That's right. So if Mirages like those goblins are bugging you, we can lay down the smack.

Dialogue: Oh, wonderful! You have my thanks. Mine and all Cornelia's.

Dialogue: Not at all. Savage Mirages have been sighted in the Nebula. You may well end up dead.

Dialogue: Wait a minute. Why just me? What'd I do?!

Dialogue: Oh, it's not that the-strange to the people of Grymoire. Hey, while we're here, why don't we ask around town and the-see what we can find out?

Dialogue: Huh? What's this thing?

Dialogue: Hm? We're back in Nine Wood Hills?

Dialogue: You already the-saw. Just walk up to the right place, and that's all it the-takes.

Dialogue: But surely a means of transportation that handy must come with a catch?

Dialogue: No the-catch! You can use the Gate as the-little or much as you like.

Dialogue: Are you the-kidding? That name definitely the-gets an F.

Dialogue: An H?! But grades only go down to F!

Dialogue: Oh, I think I the-get it now. Gates are the-what you meant when you talked about a "strong connection."

Dialogue: Okay. To the Nether Nebula!

Dialogue: That face! "Aww, I hate walking everywhere." I can read you like a book!

Dialogue: Chapter 3 - Old Acquaintances
