Original: Tama:You didn't manage to imprism those tough Mirages, but it looks the-like they gave you this prismarium from the same tribe as a consolation prize.
Dialogue: You didn't manage to imprism those tough Mirages, but it looks the-like they gave you this prismarium from the same tribe as a consolation prize.
trans: 你没能使那些坚韧的 Mirages 成为棱镜，但看起来他们给了你这个来自同一个部落的棱镜作为安慰奖。

Original: Reynn:I see. I guess we made the grade, then.
Dialogue: I see. I guess we made the grade, then.

Original: Masked Woman:The Mirages of the Nebula have been set free...
Dialogue: The Mirages of the Nebula have been set free...
trans: 星云的海市蜃楼已经被释放了……

Original: Reynn:Well, we'd batter make our way back to Cornelia, before the Bahamutians get any funny ideas.
Dialogue: Well, we'd batter make our way back to Cornelia, before the Bahamutians get any funny ideas.
trans: 好吧，在 Bahamutians 得到任何有趣的想法之前，我们会击球返回科妮莉亚。

Original: Lann:We gotta go all the way back?
Dialogue: We gotta go all the way back?

Original: Tama:You can head to Nine Wood Hills right the-now if you want to!
Dialogue: You can head to Nine Wood Hills right the-now if you want to!
trans: 如果您愿意，现在就可以前往九木山！

Original: Tama:Now that the boss has been the-bested, I can make you an Exit Gate right the-here and now!
Dialogue: Now that the boss has been the-bested, I can make you an Exit Gate right the-here and now!
trans: 既然boss已经-最好了，我就可以马上给你做个出口门！

Original: Tama:It'll take you the-back to Nine Wood Hills, and from there Cornelia's easy.
Dialogue: It'll take you the-back to Nine Wood Hills, and from there Cornelia's easy.
trans: 它会带你回到九木山，从那里科妮莉亚很容易。

Original: Lann:Thanks to the buzzcut! I remember.
Dialogue: Thanks to the buzzcut! I remember.

Original: Tama:You don't get shortcuts much the-shorter than a buzzcut!
Dialogue: You don't get shortcuts much the-shorter than a buzzcut!
trans: 没有比嗡嗡声更短的捷径了！

Original: Reynn:Uh, I think at that point, you call it a "bald-cut."
Dialogue: Uh, I think at that point, you call it a "bald-cut."
trans: 呃，我想在那个时候，你称之为“秃头”。

Original: Tama:Just head the-back to your room in Nine Wood Hills whenever you want to rest up and the-recover HP.
Dialogue: Just head the-back to your room in Nine Wood Hills whenever you want to rest up and the-recover HP.
trans: 每当您想休息和恢复 HP 时，只需返回您在九木山的房间即可。

Original: Reynn:While we're there, we should stop by Chocolatte's and stock up on items.
Dialogue: While we're there, we should stop by Chocolatte's and stock up on items.
trans: 当我们在那里时，我们应该顺便去 Chocolatte's 买点东西。

Original: Lann:Hey, you got it.
Dialogue: Hey, you got it.

Original: Tama:Oh! Those are the-called mirajewels.
Dialogue: Oh! Those are the-called mirajewels.

Original: Reynn:Hey, Serafie...um, you seem to have something sitting on your head there. What's the deal with that?
Dialogue: Hey, Serafie...um, you seem to have something sitting on your head there. What's the deal with that?
trans: 嘿，Serafie……嗯，你的头上好像有什么东西。

Original: Reynn:You didn't even notice?!
Dialogue: You didn't even notice?!

Original: Lann:Ha ha ha! Oh boy, what a doofus!
Dialogue: Ha ha ha! Oh boy, what a doofus!

Original: Reynn:Uh, have you checkedyourhead?
Dialogue: Uh, have you checked your head?
trans: 呃，你检查过你的头了吗？

Original: Lann:Guh! How did that get there?!
Dialogue: Guh! How did that get there?!

Original: Serafie:Ha ha ha! Oh boy, what a doofus.
Dialogue: Ha ha ha! Oh boy, what a doofus.

Original: Reynn:Both of you are doofuses!
Dialogue: Both of you are doofuses!

Original: Serafie:Hey! The word is "doofi." Here. I'm giving you this so let's just move on.
Dialogue: Hey! The word is "doofi." Here. I'm giving you this so let's just move on.

Original: Reynn:Uh, thank you... But, what is this for?
Dialogue: Uh, thank you... But, what is this for?
trans: 呃，谢谢……不过，这是干嘛的？

Original: Serafie:The truth is...
Dialogue: The truth is...

Original: ???:Chapter 4 - A Legendary Warrior
Dialogue: Chapter 4 - A Legendary Warrior

Original: Reynn:Okay then. Let's check in with Princess Sarah.
Dialogue: Okay then. Let's check in with Princess Sarah.

Original: Sentry:It's the Bahamutian Army!
Dialogue: It's the Bahamutian Army!

Original: Lann:What? They're here already?
Dialogue: What? They're here already?

Original: Sentry:They're setting up camp, right outside of town!
Dialogue: They're setting up camp, right outside of town!

Original: Princess Sarah:Reynn! Lann!
Dialogue: Reynn! Lann!

Original: Reynn:Oh, perfect timing. We were actually just on our way to see you.
Dialogue: Oh, perfect timing. We were actually just on our way to see you.

Original: Princess Sarah:If they've established a camp near our gates, then clearly they must intend to finish us once and for all.
Dialogue: If they've established a camp near our gates, then clearly they must intend to finish us once and for all.
trans: 如果他们在我们的大门附近建立了一个营地，那么很明显他们一定打算一劳永逸地消灭我们。

Original: Reynn:So what now?
Dialogue: So what now?

Original: Lann:Seems to me...we're going to have to nip this little problem in the butt.
Dialogue: Seems to me...we're going to have to nip this little problem in the butt.
trans: 在我看来......我们将不得不解决这个小问题。

Original: Reynn:Hm? What do you propose we do?
Dialogue: Hm? What do you propose we do?

Original: Lann:Weshould take the fight tothem.
Dialogue: We should take the fight to them.

Original: Princess Sarah:Uh, well said, but as things stand, Cornelia simply does not have the manpower.
Dialogue: Uh, well said, but as things stand, Cornelia simply does not have the manpower.
trans: 呃，说的不错，但就目前来看，科妮莉亚根本就没有人手。

Original: Lann:If you can just buy us some time, we'll do the rest.
Dialogue: If you can just buy us some time, we'll do the rest.
trans: 如果你能给我们争取一些时间，剩下的交给我们。

Original: Lann:Me and Reynn'll sneak up on their boss and take him out!
Dialogue: Me and Reynn'll sneak up on their boss and take him out!
trans: 我和 Reynn 会偷偷摸摸他们的老板，干掉他！

Original: Reynn:Hmm...
Dialogue: Hmm...

Original: Princess Sarah:I-is it really that simple?
Dialogue: I-is it really that simple?

Original: Reynn:Well, he may not exactly look it, but Lann's pretty good in a fight.
Dialogue: Well, he may not exactly look it, but Lann's pretty good in a fight.
trans: 好吧，他可能看起来不太像，但兰恩在战斗中相当不错。

Original: Lann:Please! As if you were ever any taller than me.
Dialogue: Please! As if you were ever any taller than me.

Original: Reynn:Well, I might have made up the "pip-squeak" part, but, he definitely did get picked on.
Dialogue: Well, I might have made up the "pip-squeak" part, but, he definitely did get picked on.
trans: 好吧，我可能编造了“pip-squeak”部分，但是，他确实被选中了。

Original: Princess Sarah:......
Reynn:Still, we were always kind of proud that we looked like this. Because it meant we were just like our mom, right?
Dialogue: Still, we were always kind of proud that we looked like this. Because it meant we were just like our mom, right?
trans: 尽管如此，我们总是为自己看起来像这样而感到自豪。

Original: Lann:...I guess.
Dialogue: ...I guess.

Original: Reynn:So! Let's talk more about Lann getting picked on! Boy, did they make him cry.
Dialogue: So! Let's talk more about Lann getting picked on! Boy, did they make him cry.

Original: Princess Sarah:H-how wonderful!
Dialogue: H-how wonderful!

Original: Reynn:But that's not 'cause he turned into some kind of bully-destroying machine.
Dialogue: But that's not 'cause he turned into some kind of bully-destroying machine.
trans: 但这不是因为他变成了某种欺凌破坏机器。

Original: Lann:Hey! Watch it.
Dialogue: Hey! Watch it.

Original: Reynn:So Lann... How 'bout it? Do you think we can beat those guys?
Dialogue: So Lann... How 'bout it? Do you think we can beat those guys?

Original: Lann:Piece of cake! Well, not apieceof cake. More like...a very large sliver of cake.
Dialogue: Piece of cake! Well, not a piece of cake. More like...a very large sliver of cake.

Original: Reynn:Well, there you have it. So, are you willing to trust us?
Dialogue: Well, there you have it. So, are you willing to trust us?

Original: Princess Sarah:Very well then.
Dialogue: Very well then.

Original: Reynn:Huh... What a weird thing to remember. I know someone bullied Lann. But why can't I remember who?
Dialogue: Huh... What a weird thing to remember. I know someone bullied Lann. But why can't I remember who?

Original: Brigade Captain:Hello there. Are you the Keepers from the prophecy?
Dialogue: Hello there. Are you the Keepers from the prophecy?

Original: Brigade Captain:We have been informed of the particulars. We'll time our feint to when the two of you storm the field.
Dialogue: We have been informed of the particulars. We'll time our feint to when the two of you storm the field.

Original: Lann:Where's the goblin camp?
Dialogue: Where's the goblin camp?

Original: Reynn:Up on that hill. C'mon!
Dialogue: Up on that hill. C'mon!

Original: Tama:Cornelia's soldiers are the-fighting as hard as they can.
Dialogue: Cornelia's soldiers are the-fighting as hard as they can.
trans: 科妮莉亚的士兵们竭尽全力战斗。

Original: Lann:Let's hurry up andWSHHH...circle around andBOOOSH...knock the goblins' boss senseless!
Dialogue: Let's hurry up and WSHHH...circle around and BOOOSH...knock the goblins' boss senseless!
trans: 让我们快点 WSHHH...绕圈然后 BOOOSH...把地精的老板打晕！

Original: Tama:The-WHSHHHandBOOOSH!
Dialogue: The-WHSHHH and BOOOSH!

Original: Lann:Aw yeah!
Dialogue: Aw yeah!

Original: Soldier (1):According to the vanguard's reports, many of the enemy forces are capable of inflicting blindness.
Dialogue: According to the vanguard's reports, many of the enemy forces are capable of inflicting blindness.
trans: 根据先头部队的报告，许多敌军都有能力造成目盲。

Original: Soldier (1):Good luck out there! We're counting on you.
Dialogue: Good luck out there! We're counting on you.

Original: Soldier (2):Good luck.
Dialogue: Good luck.

Original: Reynn:Huh? This thing seems awfully familiar.
Dialogue: Huh? This thing seems awfully familiar.

Original: Lann:What're those chain things?
Dialogue: What're those chain things?

Original: Reynn:Whoever the Mirages are beholden to must be close!
Dialogue: Whoever the Mirages are beholden to must be close!
trans: 无论海市蜃楼受惠于谁，都必须亲近！

Original: Lann:What? B.O.?
Dialogue: What? B.O.?

Original: Reynn:Stop it.
Dialogue: Stop it.

Original: Soldier (3):I should have known that wasn't the last of them... Thank you. I owe you my life. I know this isn't much, but here. I want you to have this.
Dialogue: I should have known that wasn't the last of them... Thank you. I owe you my life. I know this isn't much, but here. I want you to have this.
trans: 我早该知道那不是最后一个……谢谢。

Original: Soldier (4):The enemy commander has taken position further up the plains. Be very careful.
Dialogue: The enemy commander has taken position further up the plains. Be very careful.
trans: 敌军指挥官已经在平原上占据了更远的位置。

Original: Soldier (5):How humiliating!
Dialogue: How humiliating!

Original: Soldier (5):You didn't have to help me! I had those freaks right where I wanted them!
Dialogue: You didn't have to help me! I had those freaks right where I wanted them!

Original: Soldier (6):All injured soldiers have been ordered to fall back at this point and wait for further orders. Please, finish this fight for us!
Dialogue: All injured soldiers have been ordered to fall back at this point and wait for further orders. Please, finish this fight for us!
trans: 此时已命令所有受伤的士兵撤退，等待进一步的命令。

Original: Soldier (7):If I hadn't gotten injured...
Dialogue: If I hadn't gotten injured...

Original: Soldier (8):Oh, help, Captain! I'm just not cut out for battle!
Dialogue: Oh, help, Captain! I'm just not cut out for battle!

Original: Reynn:Are you okay?
Dialogue: Are you okay?

Original: Lann:We got this!
Dialogue: We got this!

Original: Brigade Captain:Good timing.
Dialogue: Good timing.

Original: Reynn:Princess Sarah was here?
Dialogue: Princess Sarah was here?

Original: Lann:What? No way. That can't be right.
Dialogue: What? No way. That can't be right.

Original: Brigade Captain:I'd like to think so, but knowing her, it's possible.
Dialogue: I'd like to think so, but knowing her, it's possible.
trans: 我想这样想，但了解她，这是可能的。

Original: Lann:Cool. Let's do this.
Dialogue: Cool. Let's do this.

Original: Soldier (9):That's odd. I could have sworn I saw Princess Sarah on the front lines...
Dialogue: That's odd. I could have sworn I saw Princess Sarah on the front lines...

Original: Soldier (10):Thanks for the help just now. You two are going up against the enemy commander, is that right?
Dialogue: Thanks for the help just now. You two are going up against the enemy commander, is that right?

Original: Soldier (11):Keep the pressure on those Federation scum!
Dialogue: Keep the pressure on those Federation scum!
trans: 继续给那些联邦人渣打压！

Original: Soldier (12):We won't let Cornelia fail!
Dialogue: We won't let Cornelia fail!
trans: 我们不会让科妮莉亚失败！

Original: Soldier (13):It's time to show them what Cornelia's 1st Brigade is capable of!
Dialogue: It's time to show them what Cornelia's 1st Brigade is capable of!
trans: 是时候向他们展示 Cornelia 的第一旅的能力了！

Original: Lann:The princess? Dude, sheishere!
Dialogue: The princess? Dude, she is here!

Original: Reynn:Heh heh... I guess she's the hands-on type.
Dialogue: Heh heh... I guess she's the hands-on type.

Original: Reynn:Your Highness! Behind you!
Dialogue: Your Highness! Behind you!

Original: Reynn:Look out!
Dialogue: Look out!

Original: Brigade Captain:Hyah!
Dialogue: Hyah!

Original: Brigade Captain:Are you all right, Highness?
Dialogue: Are you all right, Highness?

Original: Princess Sarah:Uh, yes, thank you.
Dialogue: Uh, yes, thank you.

Original: Lann:Oh shmup! We gotta find a way down there, now!
Dialogue: Oh shmup! We gotta find a way down there, now!

Original: Reynn:We can go around. If we're fast enough, we
Dialogue: We can go around. If we're fast enough, we—

Original: Lann:No! There's no time!
Dialogue: No! There's no time!

Original: Lann:No!
Dialogue: No!

Original: Reynn:Princess Sarah! You okay?
Dialogue: Princess Sarah! You okay?

Original: Lann:Dude, that move was awesome!
Dialogue: Dude, that move was awesome!

Original: Warrior of Light:I...I don't know what just happened.
Dialogue: I...I don't know what just happened.
trans: 我……我不知道刚刚发生了什么。

Original: Princess Sarah:I think I do. That light would explain it.
Dialogue: I think I do. That light would explain it.

Original: Warrior of Light:Me? Are you sure?
Dialogue: Me? Are you sure?

Original: Princess Sarah:Yes. The legends of Cornelia tell of others like you.
Dialogue: Yes. The legends of Cornelia tell of others like you.

Original: Princess Sarah:You are a Medium. One with the potential to become this realm's Champion.
Dialogue: You are a Medium. One with the potential to become this realm's Champion.

Original: Reynn:Wait, a Medium? ...A Champion?
Dialogue: Wait, a Medium? ...A Champion?

Original: Princess Sarah:Champions arise at critical points in time, where they awaken unexpectedly to their miraculous power.
Dialogue: Champions arise at critical points in time, where they awaken unexpectedly to their miraculous power.
trans: 冠军出现在关键时刻，他们意外地觉醒到自己的神奇力量。

Original: Warrior of Light:Incredible. So I'm really one of them?
Dialogue: Incredible. So I'm really one of them?

Original: Princess Sarah:Yes. There is no mistake.
Dialogue: Yes. There is no mistake.

Original: Warrior of Light:I think...the light Lann and Reynn sent me was a sort of reveille. Like I'd been sleeping my whole life and finally...woke up.
Dialogue: I think...the light Lann and Reynn sent me was a sort of reveille. Like I'd been sleeping my whole life and finally...woke up.
trans: 我认为……Lann 和 Reynn 发给我的光是一种起床。

Original: Princess Sarah:...Do you have that power? Do you have the ability to awaken Mediums as Champions?
Dialogue: ...Do you have that power? Do you have the ability to awaken Mediums as Champions?

Original: Reynn:I wish we knew. Like I said, we don't remember all that much about who we are.
Dialogue: I wish we knew. Like I said, we don't remember all that much about who we are.

Original: Reynn:Please, stand back, Princess Sarah.
Dialogue: Please, stand back, Princess Sarah.

Original: Lann:This guy must be their boss.
Dialogue: This guy must be their boss.
trans: 这个人肯定是他们的老大。

Original: Reynn:Lann, it looks like the soldier's human. Don't get carried away.
Dialogue: Lann, it looks like the soldier's human. Don't get carried away.
trans: 兰恩，它看起来像士兵的人类。

Original: Lann:Reynn, I'm shocked. I don't pick on people weaker than me.
Dialogue: Reynn, I'm shocked. I don't pick on people weaker than me.

Original: Reynn:Ha ha! I just had to make sure. Let's go, Lann!
Dialogue: Ha ha! I just had to make sure. Let's go, Lann!

Original: Tama:This thing is the-massive!
Dialogue: This thing is the-massive!

Original: Lann:Seriously! What do they feed him anyway?!
Dialogue: Seriously! What do they feed him anyway?!

Original: Reynn:Uh... Maybe we can stew over that some other time, whaddaya think?
Dialogue: Uh... Maybe we can stew over that some other time, whaddaya think?
trans: 呃……也许我们改天再炖一下，你觉得呢？

Original: Lann:Whew, see? Total piece of cake.
Dialogue: Whew, see? Total piece of cake.

Original: Reynn:Wait... This soldier's not human at all. Was he a Mirage?
Dialogue: Wait... This soldier's not human at all. Was he a Mirage?
trans: 等等……这个士兵根本不是人。

Original: Princess Sarah:What? No... The soldiers are human beings vying to become Architects and join the Federation elite.
Dialogue: What? No... The soldiers are human beings vying to become Architects and join the Federation elite.

Original: Woman in the Cage:Yes. That's right. They're here.
Dialogue: Yes. That's right. They're here.

Original: Knight in the Black Armor:How many years have passed?
Dialogue: How many years have passed?

Original: Woman in the Cage:Some. How many is a difficult thing to gauge from in here. But...
Dialogue: Some. How many is a difficult thing to gauge from in here. But...

Original: Knight in the Black Armor:Time for us has resumed its march.
Dialogue: Time for us has resumed its march.
trans: 对我们来说，时间又开始了。

Original: Knight in the Golden Mask:Yes, what is it?
Dialogue: Yes, what is it?

Original: Knight in the Black Armor:You may begin. I trust you have worked out each detail?
Dialogue: You may begin. I trust you have worked out each detail?

Original: Knight in the Golden Mask:Ohhh, I can assure you, every word.
Dialogue: Ohhh, I can assure you, every word.
trans: 哦，我可以向你保证，每一个字。

Original: Knight in the Black Armor:Then away with you.
Dialogue: Then away with you.

Original: Woman in the Cage:And you? You aren't going to waver?
Dialogue: And you? You aren't going to waver?

Original: Plumed Knight:We have a prophecy to fulfill.
Dialogue: We have a prophecy to fulfill.
trans: 我们有一个预言要实现。

Original: Knight in the Black Armor:Yes. Let us usher in a new age of history.
Dialogue: Yes. Let us usher in a new age of history.

Original: Reynn:Now would be a good time to stock up on items.
Dialogue: Now would be a good time to stock up on items.

Original: Lann:Good call. We've racked up a ton of gil, now that you mention it.
Dialogue: Good call. We've racked up a ton of gil, now that you mention it.

Original: Reynn:You have to wonder why a bunch of Mirages are carrying so much cash.
Dialogue: You have to wonder why a bunch of Mirages are carrying so much cash.
trans: 你一定想知道为什么一堆幻影会携带这么多现金。

Original: Tama:Let's just the-say that Enna Kros
Dialogue: Let's just the-say that Enna Kros—

Original: Reynn:Never mind, I figured it was her.
Dialogue: Never mind, I figured it was her.

Original: Reynn:So, why don't we go back to Cornelia and see Princess Sarah?
Dialogue: So, why don't we go back to Cornelia and see Princess Sarah?
trans: 那么，为什么我们不回科妮莉亚去见见莎拉公主呢？

Original: Lann:What is this place?
Dialogue: What is this place?

Original: Reynn:Lann! Are you all right?
Dialogue: Lann! Are you all right?

Original: Lann:Uh, yeah... Did you just see that?
Dialogue: Uh, yeah... Did you just see that?
trans: 呃，是的......你刚刚看到了吗？

Original: ???:Should you two be here?
Dialogue: Should you two be here?
trans: 你们两个应该在这里吗？

Original: Reynn:A tonberry?
Dialogue: A tonberry?

Original: Tonberry:Quite so. A tonberry through and through. Now should you children be this far afield?
Dialogue: Quite so. A tonberry through and through. Now should you children be this far afield?

Original: Lann:Far a-what now?
Dialogue: Far a-what now?

Original: Reynn:He's asking if we're lost. I guess he's got a point. I have no ideawherewe are.
Dialogue: He's asking if we're lost. I guess he's got a point. I have no idea where we are.
trans: 他在问我们是否迷路了。

Original: Tonberry:As I thought. Then you should both come with me at once. It's not safe here.
Dialogue: As I thought. Then you should both come with me at once. It's not safe here.

Original: Tonberry:I give you...the Coliseum.
Dialogue: I give you...the Coliseum.

Original: ???:Chapter 5 - The Champion Who Saved Grymoire
Dialogue: Chapter 5 - The Champion Who Saved Grymoire
trans: 第5章 拯救格里摩尔的勇士

Original: Tama:From the looks of the-it, the Bahamutian encampment is going to stay a goblin the-hangout for good.
Dialogue: From the looks of the-it, the Bahamutian encampment is going to stay a goblin the-hangout for good.
trans: 从表面上看，Bahamutian 营地将永远成为地精的聚集地。

Original: Reynn:At least they'll leave Cornelia alone for a while, now that we've gotten rid of the soldier controlling them.
Dialogue: At least they'll leave Cornelia alone for a while, now that we've gotten rid of the soldier controlling them.
trans: 既然我们已经摆脱了控制他们的士兵，至少他们会让科妮莉亚一个人呆一会儿。

Original: Warrior of Light:Once Mirages are scattered and separated from their keeper, they revert to their wild state.
Dialogue: Once Mirages are scattered and separated from their keeper, they revert to their wild state.
trans: 一旦 Mirages 散开并与它们的饲养员分开，它们就会恢复到野生状态。

Original: Princess Sarah:And wild Mirages are something you just...learn to get used to in Grymoire.
Dialogue: And wild Mirages are something you just...learn to get used to in Grymoire.
trans: 狂野的 Mirages 是您在 Grymoire 中只是……学会习惯的东西。

Original: Lann:That's why you've got Mr. Warrior here.
Dialogue: That's why you've got Mr. Warrior here.
trans: 这就是为什么你有 Mr. Warrior 在这里。

Original: Princess Sarah:Yes, indeed.
Dialogue: Yes, indeed.

Original: Princess Sarah:However, we cannot rule out the possibility of another Bahamut attack.
Dialogue: However, we cannot rule out the possibility of another Bahamut attack.
trans: 但是，我们不能排除再次巴哈姆特袭击的可能性。

Original: Warrior of Light:Actually, word has been spreading of such an organization: an anti-Federation group as large as a nation.
Dialogue: Actually, word has been spreading of such an organization an anti-Federation group as large as a nation.
trans: 事实上，这样一个组织是一个像一个国家一样庞大的反联邦组织的消息一直在流传。

Original: Princess Sarah:"League of S"? Do you know of any way to reach them?
Dialogue: "League of S"? Do you know of any way to reach them?

Original: Princess Sarah:Saronia, yes. Theyhavebeen resisting Federation annexation.
Dialogue: Saronia, yes. They have been resisting Federation annexation.

Original: Warrior of Light:Yes. Highness, allow me to journey there, and learn what I can about the League of S.
Dialogue: Yes. Highness, allow me to journey there, and learn what I can about the League of S.

Original: Princess Sarah:Alone? To get to Saronia, you must pass through all manner of places teeming with dangerous Mirages. And I...
Dialogue: Alone? To get to Saronia, you must pass through all manner of places teeming with dangerous Mirages. And I...

Original: Lann:Hey, maybe we could go instead.
Dialogue: Hey, maybe we could go instead.

Original: Reynn:Yeah! Mr. Warrior here, he and the brigade should stick around and keep the goblins in line.
Dialogue: Yeah! Mr. Warrior here, he and the brigade should stick around and keep the goblins in line.

Original: Lann:That's right. Cornelia's legendary Champion belongs right here in Cornelia.
Dialogue: That's right. Cornelia's legendary Champion belongs right here in Cornelia.

Original: Princess Sarah:What a kind offer. You would really do that?
Dialogue: What a kind offer. You would really do that?

Original: Reynn:Sure! You're doing us a favor by pointing me and Lann in a new direction.
Dialogue: Sure! You're doing us a favor by pointing me and Lann in a new direction.

Original: Princess Sarah:I thank you. We are in your debt.
Dialogue: I thank you. We are in your debt.

Original: Lann:Well, there's no sense in hanging around. So long! Take care!
Dialogue: Well, there's no sense in hanging around. So long! Take care!
trans: 好吧，闲逛是没有意义的。

Original: Reynn:Okay, then let's get going to this Saronia place.
Dialogue: Okay, then let's get going to this Saronia place.
trans: 好吧，那我们就去萨罗尼亚这个地方吧。

Original: Tama:Just hop on the train and take that choo-choo the-north!
Dialogue: Just hop on the train and take that choo-choo the-north!

Original: Cactuar Conductor:Right. Tickets, please!
Dialogue: Right. Tickets, please!

Original: On-screen:Board the train?
Dialogue: Board the train?

Original: Cactuar Conductor:Go on then, all aboard.
Dialogue: Go on then, all aboard.

Original: Lann:Holy amaze. I could stare for days...at this place.
Dialogue: Holy amaze. I could stare for days...at this place.

Original: Reynn:Looks like we're gonna have to find a way through.
Dialogue: Looks like we're gonna have to find a way through.
trans: 看来我们得想办法通过了。

Original: Tama:If things get the-dangerous or you need a break, don't forget that you can use the Gates to return to Nine Wood Hills and take a time out.
Dialogue: If things get the-dangerous or you need a break, don't forget that you can use the Gates to return to Nine Wood Hills and take a time out.
trans: 如果事情变得危险或您需要休息，请不要忘记您可以使用大门返回九木山并休息一下。

Original: Lann:Whoa! How are we supposed to get past these vines?
Dialogue: Whoa! How are we supposed to get past these vines?

Original: Reynn:What's this symbol?
Dialogue: What's this symbol?

Original: Tama:That's one of Enna Kros's the-patented Sizzle symbols!
Dialogue: That's one of Enna Kros's the-patented Sizzle symbols!
trans: 这是 Enna Kros 获得专利的 Sizzle 符号之一！

Original: Reynn:She got it patented?
Dialogue: She got it patented?

Original: Reynn:Nice!
Dialogue: Nice!

Original: Reynn:Grymoire sure has no shortage of wonders, does it?
Dialogue: Grymoire sure has no shortage of wonders, does it?
trans: Grymoire 肯定不乏奇迹，不是吗？

Original: Lann:I know. How high uparewe? I wonder what would happen if we jumped.
Dialogue: I know. How high up are we? I wonder what would happen if we jumped.

Original: Reynn:Hey, why don't you find out?
Dialogue: Hey, why don't you find out?

Original: Tama:Go on, we're the-waiting.
Dialogue: Go on, we're the-waiting.

Original: Lann:Uhhh, I'll pass.
Dialogue: Uhhh, I'll pass.

Original: Reynn:Huh? What's that light?
Dialogue: Huh? What's that light?

Original: Lann:Reynn, my legs are about to fall off.
Dialogue: Reynn, my legs are about to fall off.

Original: Reynn:Talking about it only makes it worse. But, you do have a point... I guess this is wearing me down.
Dialogue: Talking about it only makes it worse. But, you do have a point... I guess this is wearing me down.
trans: 谈论它只会让事情变得更糟。

Original: Lann:Wouldn't it be great if the Mirages in our stacks could just carry us around?
Dialogue: Wouldn't it be great if the Mirages in our stacks could just carry us around?
trans: 如果我们堆栈中的 Mirages 可以携带我们到处走，那不是很好吗？

Original: Reynn:Oh come on, it's not that simple
Dialogue: Oh come on, it's not that simple—
trans: 哦拜托，事情没那么简单——

Original: Tama:Youcanthe-hitch a ride on your Mirages, as long as they've learned the Joyride ability.
Dialogue: You can the-hitch a ride on your Mirages, as long as they've learned the Joyride ability.
trans: 你可以搭上你的 Mirages 的便车，只要他们学会了 Joyride 能力。

Original: Reynn:We can?!
Dialogue: We can?!

Original: Lann:Dude, YESSS!
Dialogue: Dude, YESSS!

Original: Tama:That's the-beee-yoootiful!
Dialogue: That's the-beee-yoootiful!

Original: Reynn:Wait a sec. I know I've seen that before... But where? I can't remember.
Dialogue: Wait a sec. I know I've seen that before... But where? I can't remember.

Original: ???:Jiants traveling with a Mirage? It seems clear the two of you are not from Grymoire.
Dialogue: Jiants traveling with a Mirage? It seems clear the two of you are not from Grymoire.
trans: Jiants 与 Mirage 一起旅行？

Original: Tama:Ah! I the-totally forgot about hiding!
Dialogue: Ah! I the-totally forgot about hiding!

Original: Lann:Yeah, we kinda forgot to shrink down too.
Dialogue: Yeah, we kinda forgot to shrink down too.
trans: 是的，我们也有点忘了缩小。

Original: Reynn:What's your name? You know, that staff
Dialogue: What's your name? You know, that staff—

Original: Yuna:My name is Yuna.
Dialogue: My name is Yuna.

Original: Yuna:Are you Heralds? Have more of you been sent to plague us? Your kind have brought enough chaos into this world already.
Dialogue: Are you Heralds? Have more of you been sent to plague us? Your kind have brought enough chaos into this world already.

Original: Yuna:Begone now from Grymoire! You have no place here!
Dialogue: Begone now from Grymoire! You have no place here!

Original: Tama:Maybe we should get the-going while the getting's still good!
Dialogue: Maybe we should get the-going while the getting's still good!
trans: 也许我们应该趁着还好时开始行动！

Original: Lann:I don't understand it. Why is she so mad at us?
Dialogue: I don't understand it. Why is she so mad at us?

Original: Reynn:Yeah, Lann! What did you do to her anyway?
Dialogue: Yeah, Lann! What did you do to her anyway?

Original: Lann:"What did I do"? Why is itmyfault?!
Dialogue: "What did I do"? Why is it my fault?!

Original: Lann:Huh? "Lusse Farna," you said? But that's our...mother.
Dialogue: Huh? "Lusse Farna," you said? But that's our...mother.

Original: Reynn:Hey, you're right! Thatwasher name!
Dialogue: Hey, you're right! That was her name!

Original: Yuna:Let me show you something.
Dialogue: Let me show you something.

Original: Reynn:That's the earringthe same one Mom used to wear.
Dialogue: That's the earring—the same one Mom used to wear.
trans: 那是耳环——和妈妈以前戴的一样。

Original: Lann:What? Then, it's her?
Dialogue: What? Then, it's her?

Original: Reynn:Right. IknewI recognized it. The ornament on Yuna's staff.
Dialogue: Right. I knew I recognized it. The ornament on Yuna's staff.

Original: Yuna:Roughly one hundred years ago, a Champion from another world saved Grymoire. Her name was Lusse Farna.
Dialogue: Roughly one hundred years ago, a Champion from another world saved Grymoire. Her name was Lusse Farna.
trans: 大约一百年前，来自另一个世界的冠军拯救了 Grymoire。

Original: Reynn:Huh? Mom did that? But, a hundred years...
Dialogue: Huh? Mom did that? But, a hundred years...

Original: Lann:It doesn't make sense. Mom's a Champion? And this is some kind of monument to her?
Dialogue: It doesn't make sense. Mom's a Champion? And this is some kind of monument to her?

Original: Yuna:So, you keep saying that Lady Lusse was your mother. Again, may I ask who you are?
Dialogue: So, you keep saying that Lady Lusse was your mother. Again, may I ask who you are?
trans: 所以，你一直说 Lusse 夫人是你的母亲。

Original: Reynn:Well, uh...
Dialogue: Well, uh...

Original: Yuna:No memory? Thatisstrange.
Dialogue: No memory? That is strange.

Original: Reynn:Do you think you might be able to tell us a little more about Lady Lusse? We'd appreciate anything at all.
Dialogue: Do you think you might be able to tell us a little more about Lady Lusse? We'd appreciate anything at all.
trans: 你认为你能告诉我们更多关于 Lusse 夫人的事吗？

Original: Yuna:I'm sorry, I only know the common legends. The ones Grymoire's people have grown up with.
Dialogue: I'm sorry, I only know the common legends. The ones Grymoire's people have grown up with.
trans: 不好意思，我只知道常见的传说。

Original: Reynn:Fine. We'll take anything.
Dialogue: Fine. We'll take anything.

Original: Yuna:Sometime around a century ago, the world of Grymoire was nearly destroyed by a being that has come to be known as the Demon Dyad.
Dialogue: Sometime around a century ago, the world of Grymoire was nearly destroyed by a being that has come to be known as the Demon Dyad.
trans: 大约一个世纪前的某个时候，Grymoire 世界几乎被一个后来被称为恶魔二人组的存在所摧毁。

Original: Lann:That definitely sounds like something out of mythology.
Dialogue: That definitely sounds like something out of mythology.
trans: 这绝对听起来像是神话中的东西。

Original: Tama:Bridging the gap between worlds is a serious the-accomplishment. She must have been the-amazing!
Dialogue: Bridging the gap between worlds is a serious the-accomplishment. She must have been the-amazing!
trans: 缩小世界之间的差距是一项重大的成就。

Original: Yuna:That she was. But sadly, even though she managed to save the world from the Demon Dyad...
Dialogue: That she was. But sadly, even though she managed to save the world from the Demon Dyad...

Original: Yuna:The Heralds... All three of them chose to remain here in Grymoire. And one of them is now Brandelis, king of Bahamut.
Dialogue: The Heralds... All three of them chose to remain here in Grymoire. And one of them is now Brandelis, king of Bahamut.
trans: 传令官……他们三个都选择留在格里莫尔。

Original: Reynn:Huh? But Bahamut... That's the federation that attacked Cornelia!
Dialogue: Huh? But Bahamut... That's the federation that attacked Cornelia!

Original: Yuna:Yes. After they finished "saving" the world, Brandelis and the others harnessed a legion of new Mirages,
Dialogue: Yes. After they finished "saving" the world, Brandelis and the others harnessed a legion of new Mirages,

Original: Reynn:"Legion of new Mirages"... Lann, you don't think there's any connection to the ones we lost...do you?
Dialogue: "Legion of new Mirages"... Lann, you don't think there's any connection to the ones we lost...do you?
trans: “新海市蜃楼军团”……兰恩，你不认为我们失去的那些有任何联系……是吗？

Original: Lann:What? That's not possible. We're talking about a hundred years ago.
Dialogue: What? That's not possible. We're talking about a hundred years ago.

Original: Reynn:But where have we been? Nine Wood Hills, which Enna Kros told us was a world without time. Right, Tama?
Dialogue: But where have we been? Nine Wood Hills, which Enna Kros told us was a world without time. Right, Tama?

Original: Tama:Right the-you are. Compared to other the-worlds, the concept of timethereis, let's say...more than a little bit the-unusual.
Dialogue: Right the-you are. Compared to other the-worlds, the concept of time there is, let's say...more than a little bit the-unusual.

Original: Lann:Dude, what?
Dialogue: Dude, what?

Original: Reynn:Umm... If you don't mind my asking, what ever happened to Lady Lusse? After the Heralds came?
Dialogue: Umm... If you don't mind my asking, what ever happened to Lady Lusse? After the Heralds came?
trans: 嗯……如果你不介意我问的话，Lusse 夫人后来怎么样了？

Original: Yuna:Unfortunately, we don't know for sure.
Dialogue: Unfortunately, we don't know for sure.

Original: Lann:What?! Well, then where can we find this castle?!
Dialogue: What?! Well, then where can we find this castle?!

Original: Yuna:I wish I could help, but I don'tknowwhere to find it.
Dialogue: I wish I could help, but I don't know where to find it.
trans: 我希望我能提供帮助，但我不知道在哪里可以找到它。

Original: Lann:Huh? How do you hide a big honking castle?!
Dialogue: Huh? How do you hide a big honking castle?!

Original: Reynn:Hey, take it easy!
Dialogue: Hey, take it easy!

Original: Lann:Well...yeah, maybe not. But you can't try and tell me this is just a coincidence.
Dialogue: Well...yeah, maybe not. But you can't try and tell me this is just a coincidence.

Original: Reynn:Would you listen?
Dialogue: Would you listen?

Original: Lann:What is it already?
Dialogue: What is it already?

Original: Reynn:Oh, just forget it.
Dialogue: Oh, just forget it.

Original: Yuna:If it's Bahamut that you're after, you should start in one of the Federation's member states, and do your asking around there.
Dialogue: If it's Bahamut that you're after, you should start in one of the Federation's member states, and do your asking around there.
trans: 如果你在寻找巴哈姆特，你应该从联邦的一个成员国开始，然后在那里打听一下。

Original: Lann:Dude, what? But I thought Saronia was the place we're going to!
Dialogue: Dude, what? But I thought Saronia was the place we're going to!

Original: Reynn:Then Princess Sarah must not have known...
Dialogue: Then Princess Sarah must not have known...
trans: 那么莎拉公主一定不知道……

Original: Lann:Ugh... Oh well. We've already made it this far.
Dialogue: Ugh... Oh well. We've already made it this far.

Original: Reynn:Yeah. We wouldn't be very good emissaries if we turned back now. And we did promise to ask about the League of S.
Dialogue: Yeah. We wouldn't be very good emissaries if we turned back now. And we did promise to ask about the League of S.

Original: Lann:I'm real sorry I raised my voice at you. I know you were trying to help us out, so thanks.
Dialogue: I'm real sorry I raised my voice at you. I know you were trying to help us out, so thanks.
trans: 我真的很抱歉我对你提高了嗓门。

Original: Yuna:No, I should be sorry for attacking you. It was wrong to accuse you of being something you're clearly not.
Dialogue: No, I should be sorry for attacking you. It was wrong to accuse you of being something you're clearly not.
trans: 不，我应该为攻击你感到抱歉。

Original: Yuna:To get to Saronia, you will need to pass through a frigid place called Icicle Ridge.
Dialogue: To get to Saronia, you will need to pass through a frigid place called Icicle Ridge.
trans: 要到达 Saronia，您需要穿过一个叫做 Icicle Ridge 的寒冷地方。

Original: Yuna:"Again, it shall be Ragnarok
Dialogue: "Again, it shall be Ragnarok—

Original: ???:You're beyond salvation.
Dialogue: You're beyond salvation.

Original: ???:An illusion? Hmph.
Dialogue: An illusion? Hmph.

Original: Plumed Knight:Well, no matter. A chase is more to my liking. I tire of simply waiting.
Dialogue: Well, no matter. A chase is more to my liking. I tire of simply waiting.

Original: Lann:What's up, Sis?
Dialogue: What's up, Sis?

Original: Reynn:Oh, it's probably nothing.
Dialogue: Oh, it's probably nothing.

Original: Tama:Hweh? My senses are the-telling me some kind of door has appeared in Nine Wood Hills.
Dialogue: Hweh? My senses are the-telling me some kind of door has appeared in Nine Wood Hills.

Original: Lann:What's this thing?
Dialogue: What's this thing?

Original: Reynn:It sure looks like a door. But does it even go anywhere?
Dialogue: It sure looks like a door. But does it even go anywhere?
trans: 它看起来确实像一扇门。

Original: Lann:Hellooo! ...Let's check it out.
Dialogue: Hellooo! ...Let's check it out.

Original: Reynn:Wh-wha Hey!
Dialogue: Wh-wha— Hey!

Original: Reynn:Where are we now?
Dialogue: Where are we now?

Original: ???:Visitors? What an unusual surprise!
Dialogue: Visitors? What an unusual surprise!

Original: Reynn:Um, who are you? And...wherearewe?
Dialogue: Um, who are you? And...where are we?

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:My name is... Huh? It was right there on the tip of my tongue. Use it or lose it, I suppose.
Dialogue: My name is... Huh? It was right there on the tip of my tongue. Use it or lose it, I suppose.

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Oh, but this is my tearoom. So who are you? Will you join me for tea?
Dialogue: Oh, but this is my tearoom. So who are you? Will you join me for tea?

Original: Lann:Uh, well, you might say that we're sort of passing through. But I'm Lann, and this is...
Dialogue: Uh, well, you might say that we're sort of passing through. But I'm Lann, and this is...
trans: 嗯，你可能会说我们有点路过。

Original: Reynn:It's Reynn. And my brother and I are from Nine Wood Hills.
Dialogue: It's Reynn. And my brother and I are from Nine Wood Hills.

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Lann and Reynn from Nine Wood Hills...
Dialogue: Lann and Reynn from Nine Wood Hills...
trans: 来自九木山的兰恩和雷恩……

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Right, I think I might know why you've come here. Shall we get started?
Dialogue: Right, I think I might know why you've come here. Shall we get started?
trans: 好吧，我想我可能知道你为什么来这里了。

Original: Lann:Uh... Sorry, come again? You know what me and Reynn are doing here, even thoughwedon't have the slightest clue?
Dialogue: Uh... Sorry, come again? You know what me and Reynn are doing here, even though we don't have the slightest clue?

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Mm-hm. You're Keepers looking for new Mirages. You've come here to touch the souls of your friendstheir past, present, and future.
Dialogue: Mm-hm. You're Keepers looking for new Mirages. You've come here to touch the souls of your friends—their past, present, and future.

Original: Reynn:Uh, I...don't know?
Dialogue: Uh, I...don't know?

Original: Lann:Whoa dude! That was a lot of words. Hey Reynn, you follow that?
Dialogue: Whoa dude! That was a lot of words. Hey Reynn, you follow that?

Original: Reynn:Uh-uh... Nope. I'm officially lost.
Dialogue: Uh-uh... Nope. I'm officially lost.

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:So, whose soul will you touch?
Dialogue: So, whose soul will you touch?
trans: 那么，你会触动谁的灵魂呢？

Original: Reynn:Hey, what are these arma gem things?
Dialogue: Hey, what are these arma gem things?
trans: 嘿，这些武器宝石是什么东西？

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Hm? You've found some arma gems?
Dialogue: Hm? You've found some arma gems?

Original: Lann:We're not exactly sure what they're for, but we did turn up a few.
Dialogue: We're not exactly sure what they're for, but we did turn up a few.
trans: 我们不确定它们的用途，但我们确实发现了一些。

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:That's good. They have great value here. You can think of those gems as a kind of token.
Dialogue: That's good. They have great value here. You can think of those gems as a kind of token.

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Yes. In order to touch another's soul, or to tamper with time, first, you must offer compensation.
Dialogue: Yes. In order to touch another's soul, or to tamper with time, first, you must offer compensation.

Original: Lann:Ohhh! So the more we find, the more stuff we can do here.
Dialogue: Ohhh! So the more we find, the more stuff we can do here.

Original: Reynn:But isn't that kind of dodging the question? Okay, they're tokens, but where do they come from?
Dialogue: But isn't that kind of dodging the question? Okay, they're tokens, but where do they come from?

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:You needn't wonder about every little thing.
Dialogue: You needn't wonder about every little thing.
trans: 你不必对每一件小事感到好奇。

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:The world has some secrets you're simply better off not knowing.
Dialogue: The world has some secrets you're simply better off not knowing.
trans: 这个世界有一些秘密，你最好不要知道。

Original: Lann:What's this stuff about "invoking" Champions?
Dialogue: What's this stuff about "invoking" Champions?

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:With invocation, you can call upon the Mediums you've met for help, and then they will fight alongside you in the field of battle.
Dialogue: With invocation, you can call upon the Mediums you've met for help, and then they will fight alongside you in the field of battle.
trans: 通过召唤，你可以向你遇到的灵媒求助，然后他们将在战场上与你并肩作战。

Original: Lann:Dude, what? Really?
Dialogue: Dude, what? Really?

Original: Reynn:Pop, fwoosh. Got it.
Dialogue: Pop, fwoosh. Got it.

Original: Reynn:All the same, the fact that we can invoke them at allit sounds pretty useful.
Dialogue: All the same, the fact that we can invoke them at all—it sounds pretty useful.
trans: 尽管如此，事实上我们可以调用它们——这听起来很有用。

Original: Lann:Yeah, it'll make collecting Mirages way easier.
Dialogue: Yeah, it'll make collecting Mirages way easier.
trans: 是的，它会让收集 Mirages 变得更容易。

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:All right, but there are restrictions.
Dialogue: All right, but there are restrictions.

Original: Lann:Uhh... Yeah!
Dialogue: Uhh... Yeah!

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:And invoking isn't free. You have to bend all kinds of divine rules to pull it off, which means more compensation.
Dialogue: And invoking isn't free. You have to bend all kinds of divine rules to pull it off, which means more compensation.

Original: Reynn:And I guess we can't pay in arma gems?
Dialogue: And I guess we can't pay in arma gems?
trans: 而且我想我们不能用 arma gems 支付？

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Not the gems. Use those here toawakenChampions. Toinvoke, you'll have to store up a different kind of tender.
Dialogue: Not the gems. Use those here to awaken Champions. To invoke, you'll have to store up a different kind of tender.

Original: Lann:Oh! That's super easy to understand. So, how do we go about storing Champion Points then?
Dialogue: Oh! That's super easy to understand. So, how do we go about storing Champion Points then?

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Wear down your souls.
Dialogue: Wear down your souls.

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:To put it simply, the gauge fills when you're hurt, and when you defeat Mirages.
Dialogue: To put it simply, the gauge fills when you're hurt, and when you defeat Mirages.
trans: 简而言之，当你受伤时，当你打败幻影时，槽就会充满。

Original: Lann:Umm... Right! Okay. So basically, all we have to do is keep fighting.
Dialogue: Umm... Right! Okay. So basically, all we have to do is keep fighting.

Original: Reynn:......
Girl Who Forgot Her Name:Oh, one thing.
Dialogue: Oh, one thing.

Original: Lann:But, why?
Dialogue: But, why?

Original: Girl Who Forgot Her Name:It takes a lot of connecting the dots to make sure they can reach you. Unfortunately, three is the most that I can handle.
Dialogue: It takes a lot of connecting the dots to make sure they can reach you. Unfortunately, three is the most that I can handle.
trans: 需要大量连接点以确保它们可以到达您。

Original: Reynn:I...am pretty sure there's no way that can be good, so...we'll pass.
Dialogue: I...am pretty sure there's no way that can be good, so...we'll pass.
trans: 我……很确定没有什么办法是好的，所以……我们会通过的。

Original: ???:Chapter 6 - Solace from the Ice
Dialogue: Chapter 6 - Solace from the Ice

Original: Lann:D'ahh! I'm freezing my butt off out here!
Dialogue: D'ahh! I'm freezing my butt off out here!

Original: Reynn:Brrr, n-no kidding. Hey, let's take shelter at that inn there.
Dialogue: Brrr, n-no kidding. Hey, let's take shelter at that inn there.

Original: Sherlotta:Ohhh! Our first guests in a while. Welcome to Sherlotta's Solace.
Dialogue: Ohhh! Our first guests in a while. Welcome to Sherlotta's Solace.

Original: Lann:Ahh! So much warminess!
Dialogue: Ahh! So much warminess!

Original: Reynn:Oh! Um, hello there. Would it be okay if we rest here for a little bit?
Dialogue: Oh! Um, hello there. Would it be okay if we rest here for a little bit?

Original: Sherlotta:Sure! The Solace wouldn't be much of an inn if we turned away freezing travelers.
Dialogue: Sure! The Solace wouldn't be much of an inn if we turned away freezing travelers.

Original: Lann:Thank goodness.
Dialogue: Thank goodness.

Original: Sherlotta:Oh! We don't see very many Jiants these days.
Dialogue: Oh! We don't see very many Jiants these days.

Original: Reynn:Wha Lann, what are you
Dialogue: Wha— Lann, what are you—

Original: Lann:Whoops! ...Oh. She doesn't really seem all that shocked.
Dialogue: Whoops! ...Oh. She doesn't really seem all that shocked.

Original: Sherlotta:Hm? Oh, well, I'm sure some folks would make a fuss. But I remember a time when Jiants wouldn't warrant a second look.
Dialogue: Hm? Oh, well, I'm sure some folks would make a fuss. But I remember a time when Jiants wouldn't warrant a second look.

Original: Reynn:Well, now that you mention it, I guess not.
Dialogue: Well, now that you mention it, I guess not.
trans: 好吧，既然你提到了，我想不会。

Original: Sherlotta:Eh, don't give it a second thought. Everyone is welcome under my roof.
Dialogue: Eh, don't give it a second thought. Everyone is welcome under my roof.

Original: Reynn:Good idea. I wonder if she's got anything to keep us warm. That would help.
Dialogue: Good idea. I wonder if she's got anything to keep us warm. That would help.

Original: Reynn:Ooooh! Is this for warming up?
Dialogue: Ooooh! Is this for warming up?

Original: Lann:Oh, this looks nice and toasty.
Dialogue: Oh, this looks nice and toasty.
trans: 哦，这看起来不错，烤面包。

Original: Reynn:Excuse me. How much do you want for this?
Dialogue: Excuse me. How much do you want for this?

Original: Sherlotta:Hmm? Wait a sec. Tell me you're not planning to cross the ice fields.
Dialogue: Hmm? Wait a sec. Tell me you're not planning to cross the ice fields.

Original: Lann:We kind of have to get to Saronia.
Dialogue: We kind of have to get to Saronia.

Original: Sherlotta:Ugh... Forget it, don't even bother.
Dialogue: Ugh... Forget it, don't even bother.

Original: Lann:Oh yeah? We can handle some Mirages. You can just point us right at those suckas. Ha ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Oh yeah? We can handle some Mirages. You can just point us right at those suckas. Ha ha ha ha!

Original: Reynn:Oh, you see, we're Mirage Keepers.
Dialogue: Oh, you see, we're Mirage Keepers.
trans: 哦，你看，我们是幻影守护者。

Original: Tama:Yes the-sirree!
Dialogue: Yes the-sirree!

Original: Sherlotta:Oh wow! We have had a lot of guests over the years, but you two are definitely my first ever Mirage Keepers!
Dialogue: Oh wow! We have had a lot of guests over the years, but you two are definitely my first ever Mirage Keepers!

Original: ???:Uh, excuse me?
Dialogue: Uh, excuse me?

Original: Refia:Um... Sorry to intrude. My name is Refia.
Dialogue: Um... Sorry to intrude. My name is Refia.

Original: Refia:You see, I've been stuck here in the inn for a while now because of all the Mirages in Icicle Ridge.
Dialogue: You see, I've been stuck here in the inn for a while now because of all the Mirages in Icicle Ridge.
trans: 你看，因为 Icicle Ridge 的海市蜃楼，我已经被困在旅馆里一段时间了。

Original: Refia:Yes. I've made up my mind.
Dialogue: Yes. I've made up my mind.

Original: Lann:Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Sherlotta:You did say you're on your way to Saronia, right?
Dialogue: You did say you're on your way to Saronia, right?
trans: 你确实说过你正在去萨罗尼亚的路上，对吧？

Original: Lann:That's right.
Dialogue: That's right.

Original: Reynn:In fact, you might say that we're on a mission of sorts for Cornelia,
Dialogue: In fact, you might say that we're on a mission of sorts for Cornelia,
trans: 事实上，你可能会说我们正在为 Cornelia 执行某种任务，

Original: Sherlotta:Good grief. I must be the only one around here with a lick of sense.
Dialogue: Good grief. I must be the only one around here with a lick of sense.

Original: Lann:Hey, no skin off my nose.
Dialogue: Hey, no skin off my nose.

Original: Reynn:Or mine. Besides, if she can use white magic, she'd really be doingusa favor.
Dialogue: Or mine. Besides, if she can use white magic, she'd really be doing us a favor.

Original: Refia:Great! Everybody wins.
Dialogue: Great! Everybody wins.

Original: Sherlotta:So! If that's settled, why not rest up before you go?
Dialogue: So! If that's settled, why not rest up before you go?

Original: Sherlotta:Normally, I would've charged you through the roof for that warlock's warmer. Just so you know.
Dialogue: Normally, I would've charged you through the roof for that warlock's warmer. Just so you know.
trans: 通常情况下，我会为了那个术士的取暖器而从屋顶向你收费。

Original: Refia:If you have any Mirages that use fire magic, they should make the trip through the ridge a little easier.
Dialogue: If you have any Mirages that use fire magic, they should make the trip through the ridge a little easier.
trans: 如果你有任何使用火魔法的海市蜃楼，它们应该会让穿过山脊的旅程更容易一些。

Original: Lann:Oooh! The cold doesn't seem half as bad now! Thank you, magic warmer thingy!
Dialogue: Oooh! The cold doesn't seem half as bad now! Thank you, magic warmer thingy!

Original: Reynn:You're right. I think we'll be able to cross the ice now.
Dialogue: You're right. I think we'll be able to cross the ice now.

Original: Tama:Saronia, here we the-come!
Dialogue: Saronia, here we the-come!

Original: Lann:Whoa. Is that the ridge they were talking about?
Dialogue: Whoa. Is that the ridge they were talking about?

Original: Reynn:It looks like the icicles have formed a bridge across the ravine.
Dialogue: It looks like the icicles have formed a bridge across the ravine.
trans: 看起来冰柱在峡谷上形成了一座桥梁。

Original: Tama:There's only one the-way to Saronia, and that's through this ridge.
Dialogue: There's only one the-way to Saronia, and that's through this ridge.
trans: 去萨罗尼亚只有一条路，那就是穿过这个山脊。

Original: Lann:Is that the Mirages she mentioned?
Dialogue: Is that the Mirages she mentioned?

Original: Reynn:Stay close to us, Refia. Okay?
Dialogue: Stay close to us, Refia. Okay?

Original: Refia:
Dialogue: #VALUE!

Original: Lann:Whoa, it melted! Thanks, Sizzle!
Dialogue: Whoa, it melted! Thanks, Sizzle!

Original: Reynn:Thanks indeed. Let's keep going.
Dialogue: Thanks indeed. Let's keep going.

Original: Reynn:Aaah!
Dialogue: Aaah!

Original: Lann:What the?!
Dialogue: What the?!

Original: Reynn:Look out!
Dialogue: Look out!

Original: Reynn:That must have been those nasty Mirages Sherlotta warned us about.
Dialogue: That must have been those nasty Mirages Sherlotta warned us about.
trans: 那一定是 Sherlotta 警告过我们的那些令人讨厌的海市蜃楼。

Original: Lann:We can't seem to imprism them. This'll be tricky...
Dialogue: We can't seem to imprism them. This'll be tricky...
trans: 我们似乎不能对他们进行偏见。

Original: Tama:If you're not sure which the-way to go, don't be afraid to look at the map and-the get your bearings.
Dialogue: If you're not sure which the-way to go, don't be afraid to look at the map and-the get your bearings.
trans: 如果您不确定该走哪条路，请不要害怕查看地图并确定方位。

Original: Reynn:All these wolves...
Dialogue: All these wolves...

Original: Refia:Must be a pack. They're not going to leave us alone unless we show their leader who's boss.
Dialogue: Must be a pack. They're not going to leave us alone unless we show their leader who's boss.

Original: Lann:Right. Let's go find that scruffball and turn him into a nice scruffy prismarium!
Dialogue: Right. Let's go find that scruffball and turn him into a nice scruffy prismarium!

Original: Lann:Wha? Hey! Stop running!
Dialogue: Wha—? Hey! Stop running!

Original: Reynn:They certainly like giving us a hard time.
Dialogue: They certainly like giving us a hard time.
trans: 他们当然喜欢给我们带来困难。

Original: Lann:He's huge!
Dialogue: He's huge!

Original: Reynn:Is that the Mirages' leader?
Dialogue: Is that the Mirages' leader?
trans: 那是海市蜃楼的首领吗？

Original: Lann:Good! Let's go after him!
Dialogue: Good! Let's go after him!

Original: Lann:We've got you now, furface!
Dialogue: We've got you now, furface!

Original: Reynn:Lann, wait!
Dialogue: Lann, wait!

Original: Tama:I don't wanna get wolfed the-dowwwn!
Dialogue: I don't wanna get wolfed the-dowwwn!

Original: Refia:I-I don't believe it. Did the wolves lure us here?
Dialogue: I-I don't believe it. Did the wolves lure us here?

Original: Reynn:No way...
Dialogue: No way...

Original: Lann:What is it, Sis?
Dialogue: What is it, Sis?

Original: Reynn:Could it be...
Dialogue: Could it be...

Original: Lann:Where didthatcome from? That's cold, pointing atmeevery time something goes wrong!
Dialogue: Where did that come from? That's cold, pointing at me every time something goes wrong!

Original: Reynn:Yeah, well in Icicle Ridge, do as the icicles do.
Dialogue: Yeah, well in Icicle Ridge, do as the icicles do.
trans: 是的，在 Icicle Ridge，就像冰柱一样。

Original: Tama:And icicles the-point!
Dialogue: And icicles the-point!

Original: Refia:Um, guys, maybe you should save it.
Dialogue: Um, guys, maybe you should save it.
trans: 嗯，伙计们，也许你应该保存它。

Original: Lann:Okay, that does it! I'll show you which one of us has more brains!
Dialogue: Okay, that does it! I'll show you which one of us has more brains!

Original: Reynn:That's what I'm scared of.
Dialogue: That's what I'm scared of.

Original: Tama:We already know who's the-smarter.
Dialogue: We already know who's the-smarter.
trans: 我们已经知道谁更聪明。

Original: Lann:I... Hey!
Dialogue: I... Hey!

Original: Lann:Oh-kay, that was fun.
Dialogue: Oh-kay, that was fun.

Original: Tama:Well, that's the-oneway to do it...
Dialogue: Well, that's the-one way to do it...

Original: Reynn:Refia, are you okay?
Dialogue: Refia, are you okay?

Original: Refia:Yes, I'm fine. Thank you.
Dialogue: Yes, I'm fine. Thank you.

Original: ???:Chapter 7 - The Thane and the Knave
Dialogue: Chapter 7 - The Thane and the Knave

Original: Refia:Welcome to Saronia.
Dialogue: Welcome to Saronia.

Original: Reynn:What is it?
Dialogue: What is it?

Original: Tama:I just the-noticed... The whole the-town seems to have a threshold around it.
Dialogue: I just the-noticed... The whole the-town seems to have a threshold around it.
trans: 我刚刚——注意到……整个镇子似乎都有一道门槛围绕着它。

Original: Reynn:Huh? Then, does that mean there's a powerful Mirage here in Saronia?
Dialogue: Huh? Then, does that mean there's a powerful Mirage here in Saronia?

Original: Tama:Very the-close. Keep an eye the-open.
Dialogue: Very the-close. Keep an eye the-open.

Original: Reynn:Hey. What's the matter? I thought you'd gotten kind of quiet.
Dialogue: Hey. What's the matter? I thought you'd gotten kind of quiet.

Original: Lann:It's so cold! I thought it would be warmer in this town but it isn't! Not ata-a-a-all!
Dialogue: It's so cold! I thought it would be warmer in this town but it isn't! Not at a-a-a-all!

Original: Lann:Ah! What'd I step on?!
Dialogue: Ah! What'd I step on?!

Original: Reynn:Ha ha, you're such a weirdo. Why are you apologizing to a cat?
Dialogue: Ha ha, you're such a weirdo. Why are you apologizing to a cat?

Original: Lann:But, you should have seen the look on its face! Scared the honk out of me.
Dialogue: But, you should have seen the look on its face! Scared the honk out of me.
trans: 但是，你应该已经看到它脸上的表情了！

Original: Reynn:Since it's our first time here, why don't we ask around and try to learn more about the place?
Dialogue: Since it's our first time here, why don't we ask around and try to learn more about the place?
trans: 既然是第一次来，何不四处打听一下，多了解一下这个地方呢？

Original: Blonde Lilikin:Can you believe it? If we raise our civic rank, we can spend the rest of our lives in a castle, wanting for nothing!
Dialogue: Can you believe it? If we raise our civic rank, we can spend the rest of our lives in a castle, wanting for nothing!

Original: Male Lilikin:Ugh, I hate worrying about my civic rank.
Dialogue: Ugh, I hate worrying about my civic rank.
trans: 呃，我讨厌担心我的公民等级。

Original: Lann:Whoa, what happened tothisplace?
Dialogue: Whoa, what happened to this place?

Original: Reynn:I know... How can it be so different from the next road over?
Dialogue: I know... How can it be so different from the next road over?
trans: 我知道……怎么会和隔壁过来的路那么不一样？

Original: Male Lilikin:The moment Saronia joined the Federation, things around here took a turn for the worse.
Dialogue: The moment Saronia joined the Federation, things around here took a turn for the worse.
trans: 就在萨罗尼亚加入联邦的那一刻，这里的情况就急转直下了。

Original: Lann:You know, from the sound of it, they must have joined up with the Federation pretty recently.
Dialogue: You know, from the sound of it, they must have joined up with the Federation pretty recently.
trans: 要知道，听他们的声音，他们肯定是最近才加入联邦的。

Original: Reynn:I think now I'm starting to see what Princess Sarah meant.
Dialogue: I think now I'm starting to see what Princess Sarah meant.
trans: 我想现在我开始明白莎拉公主的意思了。

Original: Lann:Well, for now, why don't we see if we can go talk to that thane guy about the League of S?
Dialogue: Well, for now, why don't we see if we can go talk to that thane guy about the League of S?
trans: 好吧，现在，我们为什么不看看我们是否可以去和那个领主谈谈关于 S 联盟的事情？

Original: Reynn:I'm probably wasting my breath, but try to watch what you say around here.
Dialogue: I'm probably wasting my breath, but try to watch what you say around here.
trans: 我可能是在浪费我的呼吸，但试着看看你在这里说什么。

Original: Lann:Uh, sure.
Dialogue: Uh, sure.

Original: Tama:Looks like the thane's manor is at the very tippity the-top of the town. Let's moooove...it the-out!
Dialogue: Looks like the thane's manor is at the very tippity the-top of the town. Let's moooove...it the-out!
trans: 看起来领主的庄园就在镇子的最顶端。

Original: Soldier (1):I said for ya to scram, kid!
Dialogue: I said for ya to scram, kid!

Original: Refia:Will you just listen to what I have to say?
Dialogue: Will you just listen to what I have to say?

Original: Reynn:Is that...Refia?
Dialogue: Is that...Refia?

Original: Refia:Oh! You caught up.
Dialogue: Oh! You caught up.

Original: Lann:What's going on here? They giving you trouble?
Dialogue: What's going on here? They giving you trouble?

Original: Refia:I already told them that the thane is my uncle. I'm not allowed to talk to my own flesh and blood now?
Dialogue: I already told them that the thane is my uncle. I'm not allowed to talk to my own flesh and blood now?
trans: 我已经告诉他们，领主是我的叔叔。

Original: Soldier (1):I don't care who y'er supposed to be, 'cause y'ain't seein' him!
Dialogue: I don't care who y'er supposed to be, 'cause y'ain't seein' him!
trans: 我不在乎你应该是谁，因为你看不见他！

Original: Lann:Dude, what?
Dialogue: Dude, what?

Original: Reynn:Well, you see, sir, we are here to meet the thane, on behalf of Princess Sarah of Cornelia.
Dialogue: Well, you see, sir, we are here to meet the thane, on behalf of Princess Sarah of Cornelia.
trans: 好吧，您知道，先生，我们是代表科妮莉亚的莎拉公主来见领主的。

Original: Soldier (1):What now?
Dialogue: What now?

Original: Reynn:I expected better from you, considering you're practically our neighbors.
Dialogue: I expected better from you, considering you're practically our neighbors.
trans: 考虑到你实际上是我们的邻居，我对你的期望更高。

Original: Lann:Yeah! You tell him, Reynn!
Dialogue: Yeah! You tell him, Reynn!

Original: Soldier (2):Cornelia's got Jiants for emissaries?
Dialogue: Cornelia's got Jiants for emissaries?
trans: Cornelia 有 Jiants 作为密使？

Original: Soldier (1):They got some kinda royal Cornelia thing with 'em.
Dialogue: They got some kinda royal Cornelia thing with 'em.
trans: 他们得到了一些像皇家科妮莉亚那样的东西。

Original: Soldier (2):What? You sure?
Dialogue: What? You sure?

Original: Soldier (1):Beats me. You gonna send 'em packin' and take the risk?
Dialogue: Beats me. You gonna send 'em packin' and take the risk?

Original: Soldier (2):Wait here. I'll go check with His Thaneship.
Dialogue: Wait here. I'll go check with His Thaneship.

Original: Soldier (2):The thane says he'll see you.
Dialogue: The thane says he'll see you.

Original: Reynn:Let's go, Refia.
Dialogue: Let's go, Refia.

Original: Soldier (2):Hey! The girl stays here.
Dialogue: Hey! The girl stays here.

Original: Lann:Refia's part of our antourage.
Dialogue: Refia's part of our antourage.
trans: Refia 是我们的 antourage 的一部分。

Original: Reynn:That's right. She just "ant"-eceded us.
Dialogue: That's right. She just "ant"-eceded us.

Original: Reynn:Toodle-oo.
Dialogue: Toodle-oo.

Original: Refia:Thank you, guys! You're always there for me.
Dialogue: Thank you, guys! You're always there for me.

Original: Reynn:No big deal.
Dialogue: No big deal.

Original: Lann:Yeah, I mean, it wasn't a lie. Wewereall heading in more of less the same direction.
Dialogue: Yeah, I mean, it wasn't a lie. We were all heading in more of less the same direction.
trans: 是的，我的意思是，这不是谎言。

Original: Thane of Saronia:You must be the Jiant emissaries from Cornelia.
Dialogue: You must be the Jiant emissaries from Cornelia.
trans: 你一定是来自科妮莉亚的剑特使者。

Original: Reynn:Oh, uh, yes. We're here to
Dialogue: Oh, uh, yes. We're here to—

Original: Thane of Saronia:I hear the Federation finally gave up and just invaded them.
Dialogue: I hear the Federation finally gave up and just invaded them.
trans: 我听说联邦终于放弃了，直接入侵了他们。

Original: Reynn:Yes, they did try to invade, but for the moment
Dialogue: Yes, they did try to invade, but for the moment—
trans: 是的，他们确实试图入侵，但目前——

Original: Refia:Who are you?
Dialogue: Who are you?

Original: Thane of Saronia:Hm? Why, Refia. Is that you?
Dialogue: Hm? Why, Refia. Is that you?

Original: Refia:Who are you?!
Dialogue: Who are you?!

Original: Thane of Saronia:My dear, please. It's me, your uncle
Dialogue: My dear, please. It's me, your uncle—

Original: Refia:No! You arenotUncle Takka!
Dialogue: No! You are not Uncle Takka!

Original: Lann:Wait. Sorry. What?
Dialogue: Wait. Sorry. What?

Original: Thane of Saronia:Ha ha ha ha! Then I was right. If you've managed to see through this facade, then there's no mistake: youarea Medium.
Dialogue: Ha ha ha ha! Then I was right. If you've managed to see through this facade, then there's no mistake you are a Medium.

Original: Refia:Where's Uncle Takka?
Dialogue: Where's Uncle Takka?

Original: Thane of Saronia:Why, he's standing right in front of you. Make no mistake, little girl. This is your uncle.
Dialogue: Why, he's standing right in front of you. Make no mistake, little girl. This is your uncle.
trans: 为什么，他就站在你面前。

Original: Refia:What are you...
Dialogue: What are you...

Original: Thane of Saronia:How intriguing. This must be an act of fate.
Dialogue: How intriguing. This must be an act of fate.

Original: Thane of Saronia:Ha ha ha! It's more than fate. It has to be destiny! How can I not rise to it!
Dialogue: Ha ha ha! It's more than fate. It has to be destiny! How can I not rise to it!

Original: Reynn:That answers that.He'sthe one who put up the threshold here.
Dialogue: That answers that. He's the one who put up the threshold here.

Original: Tama:He just the-changed sizes the way that you two do!
Dialogue: He just the-changed sizes the way that you two do!
trans: 他只是像你们两个一样改变尺寸！

Original: Lann:So is he a Bahamutian soldier?
Dialogue: So is he a Bahamutian soldier?
trans: 那么他是巴哈姆特士兵吗？

Original: Reynn:Well, he's nothing like the ones we've fought so far. Be careful!
Dialogue: Well, he's nothing like the ones we've fought so far. Be careful!
trans: 好吧，他和我们迄今为止打过的那些人完全不同。

Original: Lann:Aw yeah!
Dialogue: Aw yeah!

Original: Bahamutian Soldier:Heh heh heh heh... Ha ha ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Heh heh heh heh... Ha ha ha ha ha!

Original: Bahamutian Soldier:Why are you stopping? Show me more! Does fate bind us? Has destiny aligned us?
Dialogue: Why are you stopping? Show me more! Does fate bind us? Has destiny aligned us?

Original: Bahamutian Soldier:Sir Segwarides... Wh-why are you...
Dialogue: Sir Segwarides... Wh-why are you...

Original: Knight in the Golden Mask:You are a fool! To so much as inquire.
Dialogue: You are a fool! To so much as inquire.

Original: Reynn:That's not good...
Dialogue: That's not good...

Original: Knight in the Golden Mask:Awayfrom death,awayfrom life they stay! Contain them or you'll Graaah!
Dialogue: Away from death, away from life they stay! Contain them or you'll— Graaah!
trans: 他们远离死亡，远离生命！

Original: ???:Quick, this way!
Dialogue: Quick, this way!

Original: Lann:Huh? Isn't that the same
Dialogue: Huh? Isn't that the same—

Original: Cat:Well, are you guys coming or not?
Dialogue: Well, are you guys coming or not?

Original: Lann:O-okay!
Dialogue: O-okay!

Original: Tama:The-run for your lives!
Dialogue: The-run for your lives!

Original: Knight in the Golden Mask:Heh heh heh. The gods would caution us. Is this a sign that we'll not go unchallenged? That there's no way to know the pieces are aligned?
Dialogue: Heh heh heh. The gods would caution us. Is this a sign that we'll not go unchallenged? That there's no way to know the pieces are aligned?

Original: Lann:Whew! That was too close.
Dialogue: Whew! That was too close.

Original: Refia:Sherlotta, thank you.
Dialogue: Sherlotta, thank you.

Original: Sherlotta:I just knew you would get yourselves in trouble, and boy did you prove me right.
Dialogue: I just knew you would get yourselves in trouble, and boy did you prove me right.
trans: 我只知道你会惹上麻烦，天哪，你证明我是对的。

Original: Lann:Agh! What do you call that creepy trick?
Dialogue: Agh! What do you call that creepy trick?

Original: Sherlotta:You're the creepy one here!
Dialogue: You're the creepy one here!
trans: 你是这里令人毛骨悚然的人！

Original: Lann:Ah! What the honk...
Dialogue: Ah! What the honk...

Original: Reynn:Huh? Is that coming out of the sky?
Dialogue: Huh? Is that coming out of the sky?

Original: Tama:Let the-me! I wanna have a the-turn!
Dialogue: Let the-me! I wanna have a the-turn!

Original: Lann:How do you explain this?
Dialogue: How do you explain this?

Original: Sherlotta:Don't expect any help from me on that one.
Dialogue: Don't expect any help from me on that one.
trans: 不要指望我能在那方面提供任何帮助。

Original: Sherlotta:Okay, guess we'll file that one under "no one knows."
Dialogue: Okay, guess we'll file that one under "no one knows."
trans: 好吧，我猜我们会把那个归档在“没人知道”下面。

Original: Reynn:So, what do we do? We came here to ask about the League of S, but all we found was a lot more questions.
Dialogue: So, what do we do? We came here to ask about the League of S, but all we found was a lot more questions.

Original: Sherlotta:Sorry. Did you say the League of S?
Dialogue: Sorry. Did you say the League of S?

Original: Reynn:That's right.
Dialogue: That's right.

Original: Sherlotta:Oh! If that's all it is, then maybe I can help you out.
Dialogue: Oh! If that's all it is, then maybe I can help you out.

Original: Reynn:You can?!
Dialogue: You can?!

Original: Sherlotta:Oh, sure. I know a few people right here in Saronia who should be able to get in touch with the League. I'll ask them to pass on your message.
Dialogue: Oh, sure. I know a few people right here in Saronia who should be able to get in touch with the League. I'll ask them to pass on your message.

Original: Reynn:Do you mean it? Thank you!
Dialogue: Do you mean it? Thank you!

Original: Refia:Sherlotta's been around a lot longer than she looks, so she knows tons of people. Isn't that great?
Dialogue: Sherlotta's been around a lot longer than she looks, so she knows tons of people. Isn't that great?
trans: Sherlotta 的存在时间比她看上去要长得多，所以她认识很多人。

Original: Sherlotta:Don't you talk about my age.
Dialogue: Don't you talk about my age.

Original: Reynn:Eh heh heh...
Dialogue: Eh heh heh...

Dialogue: So like, what's with you and the cat-o-morphosis?
trans: 就像，你和 cat-o-morphosis 是怎么回事？

Dialogue: That...is a very long story that I don't feel like telling.
trans: 那……是一个很长的故事，我不想讲。

Original: Sherlotta:Yup.
Dialogue: Yup.

Original: Lann:Oh, uh, that's cool.
Dialogue: Oh, uh, that's cool.

Dialogue: We've still got a lot to puzzle over. But now that the League of S thing is settled,
trans: 我们还有很多问题需要解决。

Original: Reynn:Plus we've got that castle and Mom to track down along the way, too.
Dialogue: Plus we've got that castle and Mom to track down along the way, too.
trans: 另外，我们还有那座城堡和妈妈要一路追查。

Original: Lann:Sounds pretty good to me.
Dialogue: Sounds pretty good to me.

Original: Refia:From here, the best place to go next would have to be the Low Seas.
Dialogue: From here, the best place to go next would have to be the Low Seas.
trans: 从这里开始，下一个最好的去处必须是公海。

trans: 我猜这是大陆上的最后一个城镇。

Dialogue: So what about you two?

Dialogue: Are you coming back to the Solace, Refia?
trans: 你要回到慰藉号吗，蕾菲亚？

Original: Refia:Sure. I need some time to digest this business with Uncle Takka. The Solace sounds great...if you'll have me.
Dialogue: Sure. I need some time to digest this business with Uncle Takka. The Solace sounds great...if you'll have me.

Original: Sherlotta:Of course I will.
Dialogue: Of course I will.

Original: Refia:Well you two, thank you so much for everything. Best of luck in all your adventures.
Dialogue: Well you two, thank you so much for everything. Best of luck in all your adventures.
trans: 嗯，你们两个，非常感谢你们所做的一切。

Original: Reynn:Thanks! Take care!
Dialogue: Thanks! Take care!

Original: Lann:Hey Sherlotta, thanks for stepping in to help.
Dialogue: Hey Sherlotta, thanks for stepping in to help.
trans: 嘿 Sherlotta，感谢您介入提供帮助。

Original: Sherlotta:Speaking of stepping in... I don't suppose you were planning to make it up to me? For trouncing on my tail?
Dialogue: Speaking of stepping in... I don't suppose you were planning to make it up to me? For trouncing on my tail?
trans: 说到插手……我想你不会打算补偿我吧？

Original: Lann:Oh! So, that reallywasyou! Gosh, I was kinda hoping you'd forget...
Dialogue: Oh! So, that really was you! Gosh, I was kinda hoping you'd forget...

Original: ???:Chapter 8 - Buccaneer Blues
Dialogue: Chapter 8 - Buccaneer Blues

Dialogue: So let's see... Refia said to borrow a boat at the docks and head to the Low Seas.
trans: 这么说吧……蕾菲亚说要在码头借船前往公海。

Dialogue: Well then, why don't we try asking around town and see if anyone's renting them out?
trans: 那么，我们为什么不试着在城里四处打听，看看是否有人在出租它们呢？

Dialogue: Hey, did you hear? There's a real pirate ship in the harbor! It's so cool!

Original: Male Lilikin (2):You're headin' for the Low Seas? That's completely insane! I can't lend you a boat, but I'm rootin' for ya!
Dialogue: You're headin' for the Low Seas? That's completely insane! I can't lend you a boat, but I'm rootin' for ya!

Original: Male Lilikin (3):What's that? You want me to lend you my boat? But if I did that, I wouldn't be able to go fishing!
Dialogue: What's that? You want me to lend you my boat? But if I did that, I wouldn't be able to go fishing!

Original: Lann:Ugh... At this rate, we might as wellswimto the Low Seas.
Dialogue: Ugh... At this rate, we might as well swim to the Low Seas.
trans: 呃……按照这个速度，我们还不如游到公海呢。

Dialogue: Well, you can't really blame them. They probably need every boat they've got to make ends meet.
trans: 好吧，你真的不能怪他们。

Dialogue: Wait! Hold your chocobos. Didn't somebody mention a pirate ship was parked at the pier?

Dialogue: Yeah, something like that. Why, what's your point?

Dialogue: Heh heh heh. I've got an idea. What if we beat up all the pirates and then...commodore their ship?

Original: Reynn:What? There's nowayit'll be that easy.
Dialogue: What? There's no way it'll be that easy.

Original: Lann:Well, we don't have to go in with Mirages blazing. We might just be able to sneak off with it.
Dialogue: Well, we don't have to go in with Mirages blazing. We might just be able to sneak off with it.
trans: 好吧，我们不必在 Mirages 炽热的情况下进入。

Original: Reynn:I guess... It's definitely risky, but if we don't get our butts in gear,
Dialogue: I guess... It's definitely risky, but if we don't get our butts in gear,
trans: 我想...这绝对是有风险的，但如果我们不做好准备，

Dialogue: Lesser of two evils it is! Docks, here we come!

Dialogue: Not exactly the most cheerful the-place.
trans: 不完全是最令人愉快的地方。

Dialogue: Yeah, and it looks like Mirages are roaming around too.
trans: 是的，看起来幻影也在漫游。

Dialogue: These docks need to get docked a few points. Let's watch our step...
trans: 这些码头需要停靠几个点。

Original: Lann:What've we got?
Dialogue: What've we got?

Dialogue: A cannon? What's it doing here?

Original: Lann:Hmmm... Aha!
Dialogue: Hmmm... Aha!

Dialogue: Nice. It's a perfect FIIIIIIIIIT!

Dialogue: Dah! What just happened?

Dialogue: Naturally, this must the-be how the locals get around.
trans: 自然，这一定是当地人的出行方式。

Dialogue: Uh-huh. Naturally...

Dialogue: Wow, that creeped me out.

Original: Reynn:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?

Dialogue: That chime sounded like it could wake the dead.
trans: 那钟声听起来像是可以唤醒死者。

Dialogue: You don't mean a gh-gh-gh— AAAH!

Original: Lann:Hey, I didn't say it!
Dialogue: Hey, I didn't say it!

Dialogue: I think this might be a rare Mirage!
trans: 我认为这可能是一种罕见的海市蜃楼！

Dialogue: What? ...Oh, that's nothing.

Dialogue: Since when is it nothing?!
trans: 从什么时候开始什么都没有了？！

Dialogue: Ooogh, I'm really starting to get sick of all this cold...
trans: 哎呀，我真的开始厌倦这种感冒了……

Original: Tama:Maybe you should have thought of that the-beforeyou came up with this plan.
Dialogue: Maybe you should have thought of that the-before you came up with this plan.
trans: 也许你应该在想出这个计划之前就想到这一点。

Dialogue: Yeah, Lann! Nobody ever said anything about having to fight past all these stupid Mirages.

Dialogue: Ahhh! Man, do I just love the cold! Well, come on, come on! No time like the present!

Original: Lann:Oh! This must be it: the pirate ship.
Dialogue: Oh! This must be it the pirate ship.

Dialogue: Yeah. I don't think there's any debate about that.

Original: Tama:Let's be the-sneaky.
Dialogue: Let's be the-sneaky.

Dialogue: I think we've got this one in the bag.
trans: 我想我们已经把这个放在包里了。

Dialogue: Avast ye, kupo!

Dialogue: Not so fast ye, kupo!

Dialogue: Thieving pirates, kupo!

Dialogue: Huh? The pirates—did they just call us pirates?

Dialogue: Well, I'd say the pot knows a kettle when it sees it.
trans: 好吧，我会说当它看到它时，它会知道一个水壶。

Dialogue: Kupo! All paws on deck, kupo!

Dialogue: We're out-the-numbered, kupo!

Dialogue: Now what, kupo?

Dialogue: Stop saying "kupo!" and fight, kupo!

trans: 伙计们，我们不是来这里找乐子的。

Dialogue: Aaand?

Dialogue: ...We're not here to have fun, kupo.

Dialogue: Much the-better.

Dialogue: You got us, kupo...

Dialogue: It's Cap'n Faris, kupo!

Dialogue: It's created a threshold!

trans: 那个 Mirage 一定是超级强大的！

trans: 你们真好，让我的船员们振作起来。

Dialogue: Oh, you're welcome! But I thought we just beat them up.

Dialogue: That's what she's saying, you doofus.
trans: 她就是这么说的，你这个笨蛋。

Dialogue: Hmph. What are you, comedians?

Original: Lann:Clowns? Where?
Dialogue: Clowns? Where?

Dialogue: "Clowns"? Why is it "clowns," plural?

Dialogue: Yikes! Just the-look at the size of that Mirage!

Dialogue: Tama, it's time! Make yourself big!

Original: Tama:Yes the-sir!
Dialogue: Yes the-sir!

Original: Reynn:You can do that?!
Dialogue: You can do that?!

Original: Tama:Hrrrah! ...Heh heh. Guess the-not.
Dialogue: Hrrrah! ...Heh heh. Guess the-not.

Dialogue: Ugh, I should have known better than to even ask.
trans: 呃，我早该知道而不是问。

Dialogue: But they're...they're too strong!

Dialogue: I have you now. Hide Refia all you want, but you can't play hide-and-seek with destiny. Fate has chosen us!

Dialogue: The thane of Saronia? Why is he here?

Dialogue: He followed us here?!

Original: Tama:Aaaaaah!
Dialogue: Aaaaaah!

Original: Faris:Wh...what the...
Dialogue: Wh...what the...

Dialogue: Doesn't this make you just want to kiss kismet? These divine designs... Isn't fate great? Now that it's brought us together, anything could happen.
trans: 这不会让你只想亲吻 Kismet 吗？

Original: Reynn:Rrgh...

Original: Faris:You scoundrel! Find another ship to spew your bilge on!
Dialogue: You scoundrel! Find another ship to spew your bilge on!

Dialogue: So this is how...the dice have rolled...
trans: 所以这就是......骰子已经滚动......

Dialogue: Hey. Clowns.

Dialogue: Y-yes, ma'am!

Dialogue: Perhaps you'd care to explain.

Dialogue: So, the Federation replaced Thane Takka with one of their soldiers?
trans: 所以，联邦用他们的一名士兵取代了 Thane Takka？

trans: 实际上，我们自己也不太确定。

trans: 但我们告诉你的一切都是真的。

Dialogue: Honest to the-goodness!

Original: Faris:Well, believe me, I'd not put anything past those Federation dogs,
Dialogue: Well, believe me, I'd not put anything past those Federation dogs,
trans: 好吧，相信我，我不会放过那些联邦狗，

Original: Reynn:Hey, um...
Dialogue: Hey, um...

Dialogue: Captain Faris, you wouldn't happen to know where they're headquartered? The Federation, I mean.
trans: Faris 上尉，你不会碰巧知道他们的总部在哪里吧？

Dialogue: Bahamut's citadel? No one knows a lick about that, lass.

Original: Reynn:It was worth a shot...
Dialogue: It was worth a shot...
