Dialogue: Why? Was that your reason for trying to steal my ship? To go off on some wild goose chase?

Original: Reynn:Uhh... The whole idea was Lann's!
Dialogue: Uhh... The whole idea was Lann's!
trans: 呃……整个想法都是兰恩的！

Original: Faris:You don't say.
Dialogue: You don't say.

Original: Lann:What? Me? Oh, I would never everI mean I don't evenlikeships, not that there's anything wrong with yourOh, please don't hurt me.
Dialogue: What? Me? Oh, I would never ever—I mean I don't even like ships, not that there's anything wrong with your—Oh, please don't hurt me.

Original: Faris:Ha ha. Belay there, lad.
Dialogue: Ha ha. Belay there, lad.

Original: Faris:You see...
Dialogue: You see...

Original: Reynn:Huh? You mean there's more to it?
Dialogue: Huh? You mean there's more to it?

Original: Faris:Ahoy, Mog! You've read the prophecy, haven't you?
Dialogue: Ahoy, Mog! You've read the prophecy, haven't you?

Original: Moogle:Aye, I have, kupo!
Dialogue: Aye, I have, kupo!

Original: Lann:Four keys, huh?
Dialogue: Four keys, huh?

Original: Reynn:Wait, the Crystal Tower?
Dialogue: Wait, the Crystal Tower?

Original: Lann:Hmm... So Mog, I don't suppose you know where the four keys might be?
Dialogue: Hmm... So Mog, I don't suppose you know where the four keys might be?
trans: 嗯...所以莫格，我想你不知道这四个钥匙在哪里？

Original: Moogle:I'm afraid I know of only the first one, kupo.
Dialogue: I'm afraid I know of only the first one, kupo.

Original: Lann:That's one more than I do!
Dialogue: That's one more than I do!

Original: Moogle:Kupo! The first key is said to lie in a... Oh, 'twas a valley of fire, kupo!
Dialogue: Kupo! The first key is said to lie in a... Oh, 'twas a valley of fire, kupo!

Original: Lann:Where's that?
Dialogue: Where's that?

Original: Faris:I can think of one place. The fire valleys in Babil, down to the south of the Low Seas.
Dialogue: I can think of one place. The fire valleys in Babil, down to the south of the Low Seas.

Original: Reynn:Ugh, there's those Low Seas again.
Dialogue: Ugh, there's those Low Seas again.

Original: Knight in the Golden Mask:What labor, all these twists and little turns. But fate must be allowed to run its course...
Dialogue: What labor, all these twists and little turns. But fate must be allowed to run its course...
trans: 多么辛苦，所有这些曲折和小转折。

Original: ???:Chapter 9 - The Low Seas
Dialogue: Chapter 9 - The Low Seas

Original: Lann:Okay, so like, all we gotta do is cross the Low Seas and find that valley of fire.
Dialogue: Okay, so like, all we gotta do is cross the Low Seas and find that valley of fire.
trans: 好吧，就像，我们要做的就是穿过低海，找到那个火谷。

Original: Lann:Huh? What?
Dialogue: Huh? What?

Original: Reynn:Captain Faris, can you tell us how to get to the Low Seas?
Dialogue: Captain Faris, can you tell us how to get to the Low Seas?
trans: 法里斯船长，你能告诉我们怎么去低海吗？

Original: Faris:Hmm... Perhaps. But I'll not be lending youthisship.
Dialogue: Hmm... Perhaps. But I'll not be lending you this ship.

Original: Moogle:Guest, kupo?
Dialogue: Guest, kupo?

Original: Faris:You know who. Oi. The lass in glasses.
Dialogue: You know who. Oi. The lass in glasses.

Original: Moogle:Oh, from the League, kupo! She might be, kupo. I'll go look, kupo.
Dialogue: Oh, from the League, kupo! She might be, kupo. I'll go look, kupo.

Original: ???:You need something?
Dialogue: You need something?

Original: Faris:Sorry to detain you.
Dialogue: Sorry to detain you.

Original: Quistis:I thought we were done with our transaction. Did you find some sort of problem with the cargo?
Dialogue: I thought we were done with our transaction. Did you find some sort of problem with the cargo?
trans: 我以为我们已经完成了交易。

Original: Faris:No, the goods were sound. I've another quandary...if you'll hear me out.
Dialogue: No, the goods were sound. I've another quandary...if you'll hear me out.

Original: Quistis:What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: Faris:These gents here have business in the Low Seas.
Dialogue: These gents here have business in the Low Seas.
trans: 这些绅士在低海有生意。

Original: Quistis:Who are they?
Dialogue: Who are they?

Original: Faris:The Jiants from the Hills. In the flesh.
Dialogue: The Jiants from the Hills. In the flesh.

Original: Lann:Ta-daaah!
Dialogue: Ta-daaah!

Original: Reynn:Cut thatout!
Dialogue: Cut that out!

Original: Quistis:Very intriguing.
Dialogue: Very intriguing.

Original: Faris:So, they need a boat. And as I recall, you've got one.
Dialogue: So, they need a boat. And as I recall, you've got one.

Original: Quistis:Well...if it's true about the Thanethat he's some kind of monstrous Bahamutian doppelgnger
Dialogue: Well...if it's true about the Thane—that he's some kind of monstrous Bahamutian doppelgänger—
trans: 好吧……如果领主是真的——他是某种可怕的巴哈姆特分身——

Original: Reynn:Wait, "up for grabs"? What do you mean?
Dialogue: Wait, "up for grabs"? What do you mean?

Original: Quistis:Oh, my group had some business to attend to in Saronia, so we presented the thane with a boat.
Dialogue: Oh, my group had some business to attend to in Saronia, so we presented the thane with a boat.
trans: 哦，我的团队在 Saronia 有一些事情要处理，所以我们向领主赠送了一艘船。

Original: Tama:You don't need to wheel and the-deal with a bunch of no-good monsters like that.
Dialogue: You don't need to wheel and the-deal with a bunch of no-good monsters like that.
trans: 你不需要和一群像那样的坏怪物打交道。

Original: Reynn:You're not even listening.
Dialogue: You're not even listening.

Original: Quistis:So you're absolutely certain? You saw the thane undergo a transformation?
Dialogue: So you're absolutely certain? You saw the thane undergo a transformation?

Original: Faris:Aye, and then Syldra let him have it!
Dialogue: Aye, and then Syldra let him have it!
trans: 是的，然后 Syldra 让他拥有了它！

Original: Quistis:Okay. Well, don't get me wrong. I can see that they're Jiants...
Dialogue: Okay. Well, don't get me wrong. I can see that they're Jiants...

Original: Faris:Ha. One splash in the Low Seas can't stop a prophecy.
Dialogue: Ha. One splash in the Low Seas can't stop a prophecy.

Original: Quistis:...Well, I guess you win. You can take the fastcraft down to the Low Seas.
Dialogue: ...Well, I guess you win. You can take the fastcraft down to the Low Seas.

Original: Lann:Oh, sweet!
Dialogue: Oh, sweet!

Original: Reynn:Thank you so much!
Dialogue: Thank you so much!

Original: Quistis:Okay, come see me when you're ready. I'll take you to the boat.
Dialogue: Okay, come see me when you're ready. I'll take you to the boat.
trans: 好吧，你准备好了就来找我。

Original: Faris:So long.
Dialogue: So long.

Original: On-screen:Ready to go?
Dialogue: Ready to go?

Original: Quistis:Okay, right this way.
Dialogue: Okay, right this way.

Original: Faris:Godspeed, gents.
Dialogue: Godspeed, gents.

Original: Lann:Thanks! Oh, right...
Dialogue: Thanks! Oh, right...

Dialogue: We really didn't mean to cause you trouble.
trans: 我们真的不是故意给你添麻烦的。

Dialogue: You can make it up to me. Perhaps...

Original: Quistis:Come on! This way.
Dialogue: Come on! This way.

Original: Reynn:Wait, where doesthatroad go?
Dialogue: Wait, where does that road go?

Original: Quistis:It's the way back to town. I mean, isn't that how you got here?
Dialogue: It's the way back to town. I mean, isn't that how you got here?

Original: Lann:Dude! Oh, I so wish we knew about that coming in.
Dialogue: Dude! Oh, I so wish we knew about that coming in.

Original: Reynn:Well, that figures. Ithoughtsomething about these docks smelled fishy.
Dialogue: Well, that figures. I thought something about these docks smelled fishy.

Original: Tama:But at least we found some good the-Mirages! No worries, the-right?
Dialogue: But at least we found some good the-Mirages! No worries, the-right?
trans: 但至少我们找到了一些不错的海市蜃楼！

Original: Lann:Yeah! No worries at all! *whimper*
Dialogue: Yeah! No worries at all! *whimper*

Original: Quistis:Here she is.
Dialogue: Here she is.

Original: Quistis:I set the helm to autopilot, so it'll take you right to the Low Seas.
Dialogue: I set the helm to autopilot, so it'll take you right to the Low Seas.
trans: 我把舵调到自动驾驶，它会带你去公海。

Original: Lann:Wow, you're just as nice as a peach.
Dialogue: Wow, you're just as nice as a peach.

Original: Reynn:Thank you for everything!
Dialogue: Thank you for everything!

Original: Quistis:Bye now! Don't come back and haunt me!
Dialogue: Bye now! Don't come back and haunt me!

Original: Reynn:What?!
Dialogue: What?!

Original: Lann:Well, at least it's starting to warm up.
Dialogue: Well, at least it's starting to warm up.
trans: 好吧，至少它开始变暖了。

Original: Reynn:Oh yeah. The breeze is really nice.
Dialogue: Oh yeah. The breeze is really nice.

Original: Tama:I can't the-believe they loaned us this great boat! We really lucked the-out this time.
Dialogue: I can't the-believe they loaned us this great boat! We really lucked the-out this time.
trans: 我不敢相信他们借给我们这艘大船！

Original: Lann:Dude, I know, right? We don't even have to steer it. I love the easy life.
Dialogue: Dude, I know, right? We don't even have to steer it. I love the easy life.

Original: Reynn:But Lann...
Dialogue: But Lann...

Original: Reynn:Aren't you just a little worried about what Faris and Quistis said?
Dialogue: Aren't you just a little worried about what Faris and Quistis said?
trans: 你不就是有点担心法里斯和奎斯蒂斯说的话吗？

Original: Lann:What did they say?
Dialogue: What did they say?

Original: Tama:Now that you mention it, they did kind of make it the-sound like we weren't gonna live out the day.
Dialogue: Now that you mention it, they did kind of make it the-sound like we weren't gonna live out the day.
trans: 既然你提到了，他们确实有点让人觉得我们活不过这一天了。

Original: Reynn:Pretty much.
Dialogue: Pretty much.

Original: Lann:Wonder why.
Dialogue: Wonder why.

Original: Reynn:Hmm... What's so bad about the Low Seas?
Dialogue: Hmm... What's so bad about the Low Seas?

Original: Tama:What if they're called "low"...because of all the lowlifes living the-there?
Dialogue: What if they're called "low"...because of all the lowlifes living the-there?
trans: 如果他们被称为“低等”……因为那里住着所有低等生物怎么办？

Original: Reynn:That could be it.
Dialogue: That could be it.

Original: Lann:Hey, uh, Reynn?
Dialogue: Hey, uh, Reynn?

Original: Lann:Is it just me, or is the river getting more whooshy?
Dialogue: Is it just me, or is the river getting more whooshy?
trans: 只是我，还是河流变得越来越急促？

Original: Reynn:Y-you think so?
Dialogue: Y-you think so?

Original: Lann:Reynn, all of a sudden, I am suddenly getting this really bad sudden feeling.
Dialogue: Reynn, all of a sudden, I am suddenly getting this really bad sudden feeling.
trans: Reynn，突然之间，我突然有了一种非常糟糕的感觉。

Original: Reynn:Yeah, me too.
Dialogue: Yeah, me too.

Original: Tama:Bad feeling? About the-what?
Dialogue: Bad feeling? About the-what?

Original: Lann:Ohhh wooow...
Dialogue: Ohhh wooow...

Original: Reynn:Note to self: the Low Seas are not south.
Dialogue: Note to self the Low Seas are not south.

Original: Lann:What the honking HAWWWNK!
Dialogue: What the honking HAWWWNK!

Original: Reynn:They are literally straight DOOOWN!
Dialogue: They are literally straight DOOOWN!
trans: 他们简直就是直接的 DOOOWN！

Original: Lann:Aah! Gravity, NOOOOOO!
Dialogue: Aah! Gravity, NOOOOOO!

Original: Reynn:Gaaah!
Dialogue: Gaaah!

Original: Lann:Agh, jelly sandwich!
Dialogue: Agh, jelly sandwich!

Original: Reynn:H-how are we alive?
Dialogue: H-how are we alive?

Original: Lann:Tama, you still with us?
Dialogue: Tama, you still with us?
trans: 塔玛，你还和我们在一起吗？

Original: Tama:Never been the-betterer...
Dialogue: Never been the-betterer...

Original: Lann:Hey! Don't do that on my head!
Dialogue: Hey! Don't do that on my head!

Original: Lann:Now that our boat's busted, how are we supposed to get where we're going?
Dialogue: Now that our boat's busted, how are we supposed to get where we're going?
trans: 既然我们的船坏了，我们怎么才能到达我们要去的地方呢？

Original: Reynn:Ugh. Don't ask me.
Dialogue: Ugh. Don't ask me.

Original: Tama:Those Mirage the-bullies have flipped that poor little minimantoise over! How the-mean can you get?
Dialogue: Those Mirage the-bullies have flipped that poor little minimantoise over! How the-mean can you get?
trans: 那些 Mirage 的恶霸们把那个可怜的小矮人翻了个底朝天！

Original: Reynn:Hey! Cut it out! Nobody likes a bully!
Dialogue: Hey! Cut it out! Nobody likes a bully!

Original: Lann:Looks like you snakes need to be taught a lesson!
Dialogue: Looks like you snakes need to be taught a lesson!
trans: 看来你们这些蛇需要上一课！

Original: Lann:Huh, looks like even Mirages have to put up with mean old bullies.
Dialogue: Huh, looks like even Mirages have to put up with mean old bullies.
trans: 哈，看来连 Mirages 都不得不忍受卑鄙的老恶霸了。

Original: Reynn:Take care!
Dialogue: Take care!

Original: Lann:Reynn, c'mon!
Dialogue: Reynn, c'mon!

Original: Reynn:Huh? What?
Dialogue: Huh? What?

Original: Lann:We're Mirage Keepers! If you're gonna let 'em just swim away, then
Dialogue: We're Mirage Keepers! If you're gonna let 'em just swim away, then—

Original: Lann:Then you are...you're...doing exactly the right thing!
Dialogue: Then you are...you're...doing exactly the right thing!
trans: 那么你是……你是……做正确的事！

Original: Minimantoise:Meeewww!
Dialogue: Meeewww!

Original: Adamantoise:Young Mirage Keepers. My minimantoise here tells me that you saved his life. I thank you.
Dialogue: Young Mirage Keepers. My minimantoise here tells me that you saved his life. I thank you.

Original: Lann:It...it talked! With words!
Dialogue: It...it talked! With words!

Original: Tama:Hwooow... A talking the-Mirage!
Dialogue: Hwooow... A talking the-Mirage!
trans: 呜呜……会说话的海市蜃楼！

Original: Adamantoise:Now, tell me what a pair of Keepers like you are doing all the way out here?
Dialogue: Now, tell me what a pair of Keepers like you are doing all the way out here?
trans: 现在，告诉我像你们这样的一对 Keepers 一路走来都在做什么？

Original: Reynn:Uh, well...
Dialogue: Uh, well...

Original: Adamantoise:Hmm... Then, I shall help you find this "Babil." You are free to ride on my back.
Dialogue: Hmm... Then, I shall help you find this "Babil." You are free to ride on my back.
trans: 嗯……那么，我就帮你找到这个“巴比伦”。

Original: Reynn:Are you sure?
Dialogue: Are you sure?

Original: Adamantoise:Ohhh yes. I'll be your "fastcraft." Or my best approximation of what a fastcraft is.
Dialogue: Ohhh yes. I'll be your "fastcraft." Or my best approximation of what a fastcraft is.

Original: Adamantoise:Now, off we go.
Dialogue: Now, off we go.

Original: Reynn:Something's swimming around over there.
Dialogue: Something's swimming around over there.
trans: 有东西在那边游来游去。

Original: Tama:I don't like the look of it one the-bit.
Dialogue: I don't like the look of it one the-bit.
trans: 我一点也不喜欢它的样子。

Original: Lann:Why not?
Dialogue: Why not?

Original: Reynn:Lann, does this remind you ofanything?
Dialogue: Lann, does this remind you of anything?
trans: 兰恩，这让你想起了什么吗？

Original: Lann:Hey! Let's try touching it!
Dialogue: Hey! Let's try touching it!

Original: Reynn:Oh, please don't.
Dialogue: Oh, please don't.

Original: Lann:What now?!
Dialogue: What now?!

Original: Reynn:It's hostile!
Dialogue: It's hostile!

Original: Tama:And really the-strong!
Dialogue: And really the-strong!

Original: Lann:That was close.
Dialogue: That was close.

Original: Reynn:We'd better steer clear of them.
Dialogue: We'd better steer clear of them.

Original: Reynn:Lann, what are you doing?!
Dialogue: Lann, what are you doing?!

Original: Tama:Aaah!
Dialogue: Aaah!

Original: Lann:Whoa! What was that?
Dialogue: Whoa! What was that?

Original: ???:Oooh! Real actual people! I thought I might've been seeing things.
Dialogue: Oooh! Real actual people! I thought I might've been seeing things.

Original: Reynn:Uh, who are you?
Dialogue: Uh, who are you?

Original: Rikku:Oh! My bad. My name's Rikku!
Dialogue: Oh! My bad. My name's Rikku!

Original: Rikku:Man, I wish that Mirage hadn't come along and trashed my boat, 'cause I was having agreatday of treasure hunting.
Dialogue: Man, I wish that Mirage hadn't come along and trashed my boat, 'cause I was having a great day of treasure hunting.
trans: 伙计，我希望 Mirage 没有出现并毁了我的船，因为我正在度过一个愉快的寻宝日。

Original: Adamantoise:The more the merrier. Enjoy the cruise.
Dialogue: The more the merrier. Enjoy the cruise.

Original: Rikku:Thank you!
Dialogue: Thank you!

Original: Reynn:Honestly, I think we just happened to bump into a really nice one.
Dialogue: Honestly, I think we just happened to bump into a really nice one.
trans: 老实说，我认为我们只是碰巧遇到了一个非常好的人。

Original: Rikku:Hmm. Oh! So you're trying to get to the Babil region, right? You need to set a course thataway!
Dialogue: Hmm. Oh! So you're trying to get to the Babil region, right? You need to set a course thataway!

Original: Adamantoise:So, shall we be on our way?
Dialogue: So, shall we be on our way?

Original: Lann:Off we go!
Dialogue: Off we go!

Original: Reynn:Take it away!
Dialogue: Take it away!

Original: Tama:Let's the-go!
Dialogue: Let's the-go!

Original: Adamantoise:Which way do we go from here?
Dialogue: Which way do we go from here?

Original: Reynn:Well...
Dialogue: Well...

Original: Tama:The-what is it?
Dialogue: The-what is it?

Original: ???:Chapter 10 - Too Warm a Welcome
Dialogue: Chapter 10 - Too Warm a Welcome
trans: 第10章 - 太热烈的欢迎

Original: Reynn:Hup...
Dialogue: Hup...

Original: Lann:Thanks for all the help!
Dialogue: Thanks for all the help!

Original: Adamantoise:Nonsense. No trouble at all.
Dialogue: Nonsense. No trouble at all.

Original: Reynn:Thanks for showing us the way, Rikku!
Dialogue: Thanks for showing us the way, Rikku!

Original: Rikku:No problem! I needed a little breather anyway.
Dialogue: No problem! I needed a little breather anyway.

Original: Reynn:So! Where are you headed from here?
Dialogue: So! Where are you headed from here?

Original: Adamantoise:Sure. I must head back myself. Not a problem.
Dialogue: Sure. I must head back myself. Not a problem.

Original: Rikku:Thanks a bunch!
Dialogue: Thanks a bunch!

Original: Reynn:Good luck! And be careful.
Dialogue: Good luck! And be careful.

Original: Rikku:See ya!
Dialogue: See ya!

Original: Lann:Bye, Adamantoise! I'll come back and imprism you one day, don't you worry!
Dialogue: Bye, Adamantoise! I'll come back and imprism you one day, don't you worry!

Original: Lann:Right, so...uh, what's next?
Dialogue: Right, so...uh, what's next?
trans: 对，所以……呃，下一步是什么？

Original: Reynn:Well first, why don't we look for a town?
Dialogue: Well first, why don't we look for a town?
trans: 那么首先，我们为什么不寻找一个城镇？

Original: Tama:Be the-careful. Whatever's up ahead, it's causing my Mirage-dar to go the-bonkers.
Dialogue: Be the-careful. Whatever's up ahead, it's causing my Mirage-dar to go the-bonkers.

Original: Tama:You don't want to take a spill down these the-cliffs.
Dialogue: You don't want to take a spill down these the-cliffs.
trans: 你不想从这些悬崖上掉下来。

Original: Lann:Oh come on, how old do you think me and Reynn
Dialogue: Oh come on, how old do you think me and Reynn—
trans: 哦拜托，你认为我和 Reynn 几岁——

Original: Reynn:Hey Lann, slapstick's less funny if you die from it.
Dialogue: Hey Lann, slapstick's less funny if you die from it.
trans: 嘿兰恩，如果你死于闹剧就没那么好笑了。

Original: Reynn:The paths here are treacherous.
Dialogue: The paths here are treacherous.

Original: Lann:Yeah, watch your step or yo
Dialogue: Yeah, watch your step or yo—
trans: 是的，注意你的脚步或者哟——

Original: Reynn:Wow, it's even funnier the second time.
Dialogue: Wow, it's even funnier the second time.

Original: Lann:Man, I wish I was as strong as a dragon. I'd be all like "mrrrooow!"
Dialogue: Man, I wish I was as strong as a dragon. I'd be all like "mrrrooow!"
trans: 伙计，我希望我像龙一样强壮。

Original: Reynn:Which would make you onestrangedragon, but I agree. The Mirages we're facing have been getting tougher and tougher.
Dialogue: Which would make you one strange dragon, but I agree. The Mirages we're facing have been getting tougher and tougher.
trans: 这会让你成为一条奇怪的龙，但我同意。

Original: Tama:You the-need to learn to exploit your Mirages' elemental resistances.
Dialogue: You the-need to learn to exploit your Mirages' elemental resistances.
trans: 您需要学习利用 Mirages 的元素抗性。

Original: Lann:You want us to blow them up?
Dialogue: You want us to blow them up?

Original: Reynn:Um, that's "explode," and while I'd love to give you credit for the first four letters, you clearly weren't listening.
Dialogue: Um, that's "explode," and while I'd love to give you credit for the first four letters, you clearly weren't listening.
trans: 嗯，那是“爆炸”，虽然我很乐意将前四个字母归功于你，但你显然没有在听。

Original: Lann:I was listening! They're mental resistors.
Dialogue: I was listening! They're mental resistors.

Original: Reynn:Ugh! That's clearly whatyou'vegot.
Dialogue: Ugh! That's clearly what you've got.

Original: Reynn:So Tama, could you tell us more about exploiting resistances?
Dialogue: So Tama, could you tell us more about exploiting resistances?
trans: 那么 Tama，你能告诉我们更多关于利用阻力的信息吗？

Original: Reynn:Would you stop?
Dialogue: Would you stop?

Original: Tama:Right, where the-was I... Oh! You may have noticed the Mirages here like to the-fight with fire.
Dialogue: Right, where the-was I... Oh! You may have noticed the Mirages here like to the-fight with fire.

Original: Reynn:But if you put Mirages with high fire resistance in your stacks...
Dialogue: But if you put Mirages with high fire resistance in your stacks...
trans: 但是如果你把具有高耐火性的幻影放在你的堆叠中......

Original: Tama:You can the-reduce the damage you take from flames.
Dialogue: You can the-reduce the damage you take from flames.
trans: 你可以减少你从火焰中受到的伤害。

Original: Lann:Dude, it all makes sense now.
Dialogue: Dude, it all makes sense now.
trans: 伙计，现在一切都有意义了。

Original: Reynn:What? The elemental resistance stuff? You actually followed that?
Dialogue: What? The elemental resistance stuff? You actually followed that?

Original: Lann:Sure! Basically, we need to imprism as many of the Mirages around here as we can.
Dialogue: Sure! Basically, we need to imprism as many of the Mirages around here as we can.

Original: Reynn:Whoa!
Dialogue: Whoa!

Original: Tama:You're the-right!
Dialogue: You're the-right!

Original: Reynn:Somehow, you understoodwhatto do even if you didn't understand the whys.
Dialogue: Somehow, you understood what to do even if you didn't understand the whys.
trans: 不知何故，即使您不明白为什么，您也知道该怎么做。

Original: Lann:Ha ha ha! I'm a man of action! I don't believe in "whys"!
Dialogue: Ha ha ha! I'm a man of action! I don't believe in "whys"!

Original: Tama:That much is the-obvious.
Dialogue: That much is the-obvious.

Original: Reynn:No one in her right mind would put "Lann" and "wise" in the same sentence.
Dialogue: No one in her right mind would put "Lann" and "wise" in the same sentence.
trans: 没有一个头脑正常的人会将“Lann”和“wise”放在同一个句子中。

Original: Lann:Whoa whoa whoa! What's it doing?!
Dialogue: Whoa whoa whoa! What's it doing?!

Original: Tama:It the-knows how to play defense!
Dialogue: It the-knows how to play defense!

Original: Reynn:I guess we'll have to give it what it wants...
Dialogue: I guess we'll have to give it what it wants...
trans: 我想我们必须给它想要的东西......

Original: Lann:Uh...Reynn? Do you hear something?
Dialogue: Uh...Reynn? Do you hear something?

Original: Lann:Gosh, who knew the winds of Babil could be so toasty.
Dialogue: Gosh, who knew the winds of Babil could be so toasty.
trans: 天哪，谁知道巴比伦的风会如此温暖。

Original: Reynn:Lann! Shrink, now!
Dialogue: Lann! Shrink, now!

Original: Lann:Aieee! Holy Mom bombs!
Dialogue: Aieee! Holy Mom bombs!

Original: Reynn:Get ready!
Dialogue: Get ready!

Original: Lann:Please don't eat me! I taste awful!
Dialogue: Please don't eat me! I taste awful!

Original: Reynn:Yeah! We all taste bad! But especially Lann!
Dialogue: Yeah! We all taste bad! But especially Lann!

Original: Tama:He'll make you the-want to barf!
Dialogue: He'll make you the-want to barf!

Original: Lann:You don't have to be mean about it!
Dialogue: You don't have to be mean about it!

Original: Lann:Yay for miracles.
Dialogue: Yay for miracles.

Original: Tama:Now's our chance to run the-past them!
Dialogue: Now's our chance to run the-past them!
trans: 现在是我们超越他们的机会了！

Original: Lann:Yeah, good i
Dialogue: Yeah, good i—

Original: Tama:It's...behind the-me, isn't it.
Dialogue: It's...behind the-me, isn't it.

Original: Tifa:Whoa! It finally worked!
Dialogue: Whoa! It finally worked!

Original: Tifa:Oh! I can celebrate later. Come on, this way! Hurry!
Dialogue: Oh! I can celebrate later. Come on, this way! Hurry!

Original: Masked Woman:The two of them have started something. Mediums have been awakening one after the next.
Dialogue: The two of them have started something. Mediums have been awakening one after the next.
trans: 他们两个开始了一些事情。

Original: Plumed Knight:Then you mean the Azure Prophecy...is coming true.
Dialogue: Then you mean the Azure Prophecy...is coming true.
trans: 那么你的意思是 Azure 预言……正在成真。

Original: Masked Woman:The only force that can change those laws is the almighty power of a true king.
Dialogue: The only force that can change those laws is the almighty power of a true king.
trans: 唯一可以改变这些法律的力量是真正国王的全能力量。

Original: Plumed Knight:We must fulfill the Crimson Prophecy. And swiftly. Are we agreed?
Dialogue: We must fulfill the Crimson Prophecy. And swiftly. Are we agreed?
trans: 我们必须实现深红预言。

Original: Tama:Thanks again! You really saved our biscuits the-back there!
Dialogue: Thanks again! You really saved our biscuits the-back there!

Original: Reynn:Who knew they came in sets?
Dialogue: Who knew they came in sets?
trans: 谁知道他们是成群结队的？

Original: Tifa:I'm just glad you're all right. Huge dragons live in the Scars. You're lucky you only ran into the two.
Dialogue: I'm just glad you're all right. Huge dragons live in the Scars. You're lucky you only ran into the two.

Original: Lann:It's a good thing you did. Gotta say, though, you pack quite a punch!
Dialogue: It's a good thing you did. Gotta say, though, you pack quite a punch!

Original: Tifa:Oh. Well...I might've gotten lucky.
Dialogue: Oh. Well...I might've gotten lucky.

Original: Tifa:That's actually one of my master's moves. That was the first time I ever managed to pull it off.
Dialogue: That's actually one of my master's moves. That was the first time I ever managed to pull it off.
trans: 那其实是我师傅的招式之一。

Original: Reynn:I guess she's a Champion too.
Dialogue: I guess she's a Champion too.

Original: Lann:I'll say! She sure punches like one!
Dialogue: I'll say! She sure punches like one!

Original: Tama:Makes you wonder what her master must be the-like!
Dialogue: Makes you wonder what her master must be the-like!
trans: 让人想知道她的主人一定是个什么样的人！

Original: Lann:She said her town was north of here, didn't she?
Dialogue: She said her town was north of here, didn't she?
trans: 她说她的镇子在这儿的北边，是吗？

Original: Reynn:Yeah. Wait... I think I can actually see it from here.
Dialogue: Yeah. Wait... I think I can actually see it from here.

Original: Tama:Brrr! S-something about that place makes my fur the-crawl! I don't know what it is, but it gives me the heebie-the-jeebies!
Dialogue: Brrr! S-something about that place makes my fur the-crawl! I don't know what it is, but it gives me the heebie-the-jeebies!

Original: Lann:Are you guys seeing this town?
Dialogue: Are you guys seeing this town?
trans: 你们看到这个小镇了吗？

Original: Reynn:Yeah... That's where Tifa lives?
Dialogue: Yeah... That's where Tifa lives?

Original: Tama:It makes Nine Wood Hills look the-humble!
Dialogue: It makes Nine Wood Hills look the-humble!
trans: 这让九木山看起来很不起眼！

Original: Lann:Well, this is a charming little town. But something feels kind of...I dunno, "off" about it.
Dialogue: Well, this is a charming little town. But something feels kind of...I dunno, "off" about it.
trans: 嗯，这是一个迷人的小镇。

Original: Reynn:Hmmm... I think it might be a good idea for us to keep a low profile around here.
Dialogue: Hmmm... I think it might be a good idea for us to keep a low profile around here.
trans: 嗯……我认为我们在这里保持低调可能是个好主意。

Original: Lann:Why's that?
Dialogue: Why's that?

Original: Reynn:Because... Oh, just do it!
Dialogue: Because... Oh, just do it!

Original: Lann:Uh, okay. Low profile, Tama.
Dialogue: Uh, okay. Low profile, Tama.

Original: Tama:Okay. Roger the-wilco...
Dialogue: Okay. Roger the-wilco...

Original: Lann:Hey, you know that really big Mirage we have? Why is it so huge?
Dialogue: Hey, you know that really big Mirage we have? Why is it so huge?
trans: 嘿，你知道我们有非常大的 Mirage 吗？

Original: Tama:It's more than the-hugeit's mega! A "Mega Mirage"!
Dialogue: It's more than the-huge—it's mega! A "Mega Mirage"!
trans: 它不仅仅是巨大的——它是巨大的！

Original: Reynn:Can we even use something that big in our stacks?
Dialogue: Can we even use something that big in our stacks?
trans: 我们甚至可以在堆栈中使用这么大的东西吗？

Original: Tama:Well, I wouldn't the-recommend stacking it on top of you. Not unless you want to get squished the-flat.
Dialogue: Well, I wouldn't the-recommend stacking it on top of you. Not unless you want to get squished the-flat.
trans: 好吧，我不建议把它叠在你身上。

Original: Reynn:Ooh, ouch, we don't want that. Butwecould stack on top ofthem, right?
Dialogue: Ooh, ouch, we don't want that. But we could stack on top of them, right?
trans: 哦，哎哟，我们不想要那个。

Original: Tama:You sure the-can! But you'll need to use the-both your powers in battle if you want to summon forth a Mega Mirage.
Dialogue: You sure the-can! But you'll need to use the-both your powers in battle if you want to summon forth a Mega Mirage.

Original: Lann:Sounds good! I'm the kind of guy that learns best in the heat of the moment.
Dialogue: Sounds good! I'm the kind of guy that learns best in the heat of the moment.

Original: Reynn:In other words, you hate studying and you won't practice.
Dialogue: In other words, you hate studying and you won't practice.
trans: 也就是说，你讨厌学习，你不会练习。

Original: ???:Chapter 11 - Crimson and Azure
Dialogue: Chapter 11 - Crimson and Azure

Original: Lann:Hold on a sec.
Dialogue: Hold on a sec.

Original: Lann:Hmm... I don't see any chain on the place.
Dialogue: Hmm... I don't see any chain on the place.
trans: 嗯……我没看到这个地方有任何链条。

Original: Reynn:Well, maybe they're like Cornelia, and they haven't been annexed by the Federation.
Dialogue: Well, maybe they're like Cornelia, and they haven't been annexed by the Federation.
trans: 好吧，也许他们就像科妮莉亚一样，并没有被联邦吞并。

Original: Tifa:Huh? It can't be.
Dialogue: Huh? It can't be.

Original: Tifa:Hey there, guys! Itisyou, right?
Dialogue: Hey there, guys! It is you, right?

Original: Lann:Hey! Super punchy girl!
Dialogue: Hey! Super punchy girl!

Original: Reynn:Hi! How are you doing, Tifa?
Dialogue: Hi! How are you doing, Tifa?

Original: Tama:It's the-good to see you!
Dialogue: It's the-good to see you!

Original: Tifa:Same here!
Dialogue: Same here!

Original: Reynn:Oh, yeah. I guess we never told you, did we?
Dialogue: Oh, yeah. I guess we never told you, did we?

Original: Tifa:Oh, good! I was starting to worry.
Dialogue: Oh, good! I was starting to worry.

Original: Lann:It's weird. Why does everybody keep thinking that we're Bahamutian soldiers?
Dialogue: It's weird. Why does everybody keep thinking that we're Bahamutian soldiers?

Original: Reynn:I don't know. I guess they don't see many Mirage Keepers anymore, unless they're working for the bad guys.
Dialogue: I don't know. I guess they don't see many Mirage Keepers anymore, unless they're working for the bad guys.

Original: Tifa:Yeah... And not just Keepers. Jiants, too.
Dialogue: Yeah... And not just Keepers. Jiants, too.
trans: 是的...而且不仅仅是守护者。

Original: Tifa:Still, the prophecy's a hot topic around Nibelheim. Everyone in town has heard of the Jiants from the Hills.
Dialogue: Still, the prophecy's a hot topic around Nibelheim. Everyone in town has heard of the Jiants from the Hills.
trans: 尽管如此，这个预言仍然是尼布尔海姆周围的热门话题。

Original: Reynn:Ugh... I'm not sure I like being a celebrity.
Dialogue: Ugh... I'm not sure I like being a celebrity.
trans: 呃……我不确定我喜欢当名人。

Original: Tifa:Anyway. So you're looking for the valley of fire?
Dialogue: Anyway. So you're looking for the valley of fire?

Original: Reynn:Unfortunately, that's the only real clue that we've got.
Dialogue: Unfortunately, that's the only real clue that we've got.
trans: 不幸的是，这是我们得到的唯一真正的线索。

Original: Tifa:The valley of fire... Everyone knows that bit. But no one knows which valley is the right one.
Dialogue: The valley of fire... Everyone knows that bit. But no one knows which valley is the right one.
trans: 火焰谷……那一点谁都知道。

Original: Lann:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?

Original: Tifa:If you're looking for fiery valleys, this region is full of them.
Dialogue: If you're looking for fiery valleys, this region is full of them.
trans: 如果您正在寻找火热的山谷，这个地区到处都是。

Original: Tifa:Let me introduce the Jiants from the Hills.
Dialogue: Let me introduce the Jiants from the Hills.
trans: 让我介绍一下山上的剑客。

Original: Lann:Aha ha ha...heh.
Dialogue: Aha ha ha...heh.

Original: Reynn:Yeah, that's us.
Dialogue: Yeah, that's us.

Original: Rydia:Hello there. I am the summoner Rydia.
Dialogue: Hello there. I am the summoner Rydia.

Original: Rydia:Hm? Something here is not right. Something about you...
Dialogue: Hm? Something here is not right. Something about you...

Original: Lann:Hey, you know...the way that Mirage follows you...
Dialogue: Hey, you know...the way that Mirage follows you...
trans: 嘿，你知道……幻影跟随你的方式……

Original: Rydia:Huh? You mean you know Lady Yuna?
Dialogue: Huh? You mean you know Lady Yuna?

Original: Reynn:Yeah, we met her. Back on the upper continent. She was really a lot of help to us.
Dialogue: Yeah, we met her. Back on the upper continent. She was really a lot of help to us.

Original: Tama:We might not even be the-here if Yuna hadn't pointed us in the right direction.
Dialogue: We might not even be the-here if Yuna hadn't pointed us in the right direction.
trans: 如果 Yuna 没有为我们指明正确的方向，我们甚至可能不会在这里。

Original: Rydia:Oh... Well then... I suppose you can't beallthat bad.
Dialogue: Oh... Well then... I suppose you can't be all that bad.
trans: 哦……那么……我想你不会那么坏。

Original: Rydia:There now. You hear that? These two say they're friends with Lady Yuna.
Dialogue: There now. You hear that? These two say they're friends with Lady Yuna.

Original: Rydia:So let me get this straight. You're searching for the four keys recorded in the prophecy?
Dialogue: So let me get this straight. You're searching for the four keys recorded in the prophecy?
trans: 所以让我弄清楚这一点。

Original: Lann:Yeah. We came to Babil because we heard one of the keys was hidden here, in a valley of fire.
Dialogue: Yeah. We came to Babil because we heard one of the keys was hidden here, in a valley of fire.

Original: Rydia:Right, but you know, the keys are part of theCrimsonProphecy.
Dialogue: Right, but you know, the keys are part of the Crimson Prophecy.
trans: 是的，但你知道，钥匙是深红预言的一部分。

Original: Reynn:Crimson Prophecy? So wait, you mean there's more than one version?
Dialogue: Crimson Prophecy? So wait, you mean there's more than one version?

Original: Rydia:Yes. There used to be a single prophecy: theAzureProphecy.
Dialogue: Yes. There used to be a single prophecy the Azure Prophecy.

Original: Fanatical Man:The Azure Prophecy is heresy!
Dialogue: The Azure Prophecy is heresy!

Original: Rydia:Ugh, this is no business of yours.
Dialogue: Ugh, this is no business of yours.

Original: Fanatical Woman:Lies! Only the Crimson Prophecy is gospel!
Dialogue: Lies! Only the Crimson Prophecy is gospel!

Original: Fanatical Man:Are you a summoner or not? You should pray that fate guides you to the Crystal Tower.
Dialogue: Are you a summoner or not? You should pray that fate guides you to the Crystal Tower.

Original: Fanatical Woman:The Crimson Prophecy is clear. Flanked by Mirages, the chosen ones shall acquire four keys.
Dialogue: The Crimson Prophecy is clear. Flanked by Mirages, the chosen ones shall acquire four keys.

Original: Fanatical Man:From the Crystal Tower they shall mount the heavens, where god will grant them the gift of eternity!
Dialogue: From the Crystal Tower they shall mount the heavens, where god will grant them the gift of eternity!
trans: 他们将从水晶塔登上天堂，上帝将在那里赐予他们永恒的礼物！

Original: Fanatical Woman:So long as you know to look for the signs, the keys shall be found.
Dialogue: So long as you know to look for the signs, the keys shall be found.
trans: 只要您知道寻找标志，就可以找到钥匙。

Original: Fanatical Man:So do as the Crimson Prophecy commands of you, hmm?
Dialogue: So do as the Crimson Prophecy commands of you, hmm?
trans: 所以按照 Crimson Prophecy 的命令去做，嗯？

Original: Rydia:Ugh. All you hear these days is that nonsense!
Dialogue: Ugh. All you hear these days is that nonsense!

Original: Tifa:Yeah, no kidding. At least they're not breaking any laws or getting violent, but it's still creepy.
Dialogue: Yeah, no kidding. At least they're not breaking any laws or getting violent, but it's still creepy.

Original: Rydia:What do those fools know, anyway? The Azure Prophecy was written by the First Summoner!
Dialogue: What do those fools know, anyway? The Azure Prophecy was written by the First Summoner!
trans: 无论如何，那些傻瓜知道什么？

Original: Tifa:Still, that sham seems to be the prophecy folks believe in.
Dialogue: Still, that sham seems to be the prophecy folks believe in.
trans: 尽管如此，这个骗局似乎是人们所相信的预言。

Original: Rydia:Unfortunately so. That's why I came here to sort the truth out myself.
Dialogue: Unfortunately so. That's why I came here to sort the truth out myself.

Original: Reynn:You see...
Dialogue: You see...

Original: Rydia:So you're telling me that your mother shares the same name as Lady Lusse Farna?
Dialogue: So you're telling me that your mother shares the same name as Lady Lusse Farna?
trans: 所以你是说你妈妈和 Lusse Farna 夫人同名？

Original: Tifa:I get it! If you really are the Jiants from the Hills, all you have to do is follow the prophecy, and you might wind up there anyway.
Dialogue: I get it! If you really are the Jiants from the Hills, all you have to do is follow the prophecy, and you might wind up there anyway.

Original: Reynn:Right. There's actually more to it.
Dialogue: Right. There's actually more to it.

Original: Rydia:Hmm... Well, whatever the case, it seems the only way to prove which prophecy is true...
Dialogue: Hmm... Well, whatever the case, it seems the only way to prove which prophecy is true...
trans: 嗯……好吧，不管怎样，似乎只有这样才能证明哪个预言是真的……

Original: Lann:What do you mean?
Dialogue: What do you mean?

Original: Rydia:Oh! Never you mind! So, are we ready?
Dialogue: Oh! Never you mind! So, are we ready?

Original: Reynn:Uh, "are we ready"? We don't even know which valley to go to.
Dialogue: Uh, "are we ready"? We don't even know which valley to go to.

Original: Lann:All right, Placey Place! Here we come!
Dialogue: All right, Placey Place! Here we come!

Original: Reynn:Now you're forgetting entire names?
Dialogue: Now you're forgetting entire names?
trans: 现在你忘记了整个名字？

Original: Tifa:A while back, there used to be a town called Mist here. But then a big disaster left the town in ruin.
Dialogue: A while back, there used to be a town called Mist here. But then a big disaster left the town in ruin.
trans: 前段时间，这里曾经有一个小镇，叫做米斯特。

Original: Reynn:So Rydia, what's the difference between a summoner like you and a Mirage Keeper?
Dialogue: So Rydia, what's the difference between a summoner like you and a Mirage Keeper?
trans: 那么 Rydia，像你这样的召唤师和 Mirage Keeper 有什么区别？

Original: Rydia:You know, I should be asking you the same thing.
Dialogue: You know, I should be asking you the same thing.
trans: 你知道，我应该问你同样的事情。

Original: Reynn:Huh? Well...I guess I've never really thought about it that much.
Dialogue: Huh? Well...I guess I've never really thought about it that much.

Original: Tama:Hwah? Hmm... Good the-question. I never the-really thought about it as some kind of the-bond before.
Dialogue: Hwah? Hmm... Good the-question. I never the-really thought about it as some kind of the-bond before.

Original: Rydia:Huh? Then Tama's not your familiar?
Dialogue: Huh? Then Tama's not your familiar?

Original: Rydia:Yes. Mine is this dragon here.
Dialogue: Yes. Mine is this dragon here.

Original: Tama:Oh, I'm under no the-obligation to protect Lann and Reynn. It's the-optional!
Dialogue: Oh, I'm under no the-obligation to protect Lann and Reynn. It's the-optional!
trans: 哦，我没有义务保护兰恩和雷恩。

Original: Reynn:Gee thanks.
Dialogue: Gee thanks.

Original: Rydia:As far as I can tell, there must be a big difference indeed.
Dialogue: As far as I can tell, there must be a big difference indeed.
trans: 据我所知，确实有很大的不同。

Original: Rydia:Let's head down to Valley Seven.
Dialogue: Let's head down to Valley Seven.

Original: Tama:Valley Seven is east of the-here.
Dialogue: Valley Seven is east of the-here.

Original: Tama:Ooogh... I think my fur is the-melting...
Dialogue: Ooogh... I think my fur is the-melting...
trans: 噢……我觉得我的皮毛快要融化了……

Original: Reynn:Valley of fire, you are way,waytoo fiery...
Dialogue: Valley of fire, you are way, way too fiery...

Original: Reynn:Hmm? You okay?
Dialogue: Hmm? You okay?

Original: Rydia:Oh! I'm all right. Shall we?
Dialogue: Oh! I'm all right. Shall we?

Original: Lann:Dude, I'm burning up...
Dialogue: Dude, I'm burning up...

Original: Tama:Me the-too...
Dialogue: Me the-too...

Original: Reynn:Just think about cold things! ...And then think about them melting.
Dialogue: Just think about cold things! ...And then think about them melting.

Original: Reynn:One wrong step and we're finished.
Dialogue: One wrong step and we're finished.
trans: 一个错误的步骤，我们就完了。

Original: Reynn:Aaah! Why are you sneezing?! It's like five hundred degrees in here!
Dialogue: Aaah! Why are you sneezing?! It's like five hundred degrees in here!

Original: Reynn:What's going on? We'll never be able to put out a firethisbig. Not with the Mirages that we've got!
Dialogue: What's going on? We'll never be able to put out a fire this big. Not with the Mirages that we've got!

Original: Rydia:I can't TAKE IT!
Dialogue: I can't TAKE IT!

Original: Lann:Oh...right! We gotta go after her!
Dialogue: Oh...right! We gotta go after her!

Original: Tama:Wh-what he the-said!
Dialogue: Wh-what he the-said!

Original: Reynn:I think she went back this way, right?
Dialogue: I think she went back this way, right?
trans: 我想她是这样回去的，对吧？

Original: Lann:We're coming!
Dialogue: We're coming!

Original: Reynn:Watch out! These things could explode at any moment!
Dialogue: Watch out! These things could explode at any moment!

Original: Tama:Everyone! The-use Lann as a shield!
Dialogue: Everyone! The-use Lann as a shield!

Original: Reynn:Right. Good idea. You ready, Lann?
Dialogue: Right. Good idea. You ready, Lann?

Original: Lann:Right. Wait, you're gonna use me as a WHAT?!
Dialogue: Right. Wait, you're gonna use me as a WHAT?!

Original: Rydia:No! Stay away!
Dialogue: No! Stay away!

Original: Reynn:Rydia! Are you okay?
Dialogue: Rydia! Are you okay?

Original: Lann:Then why'd you come to a place like this?
Dialogue: Then why'd you come to a place like this?
trans: 那你怎么会来这种地方？

Original: Rydia:You needed someone to help you, didn't you? I wanted to conquer my fears!
Dialogue: You needed someone to help you, didn't you? I wanted to conquer my fears!
trans: 你需要有人帮助你，不是吗？

Original: Lann:Well, I'd say you did pretty great!
Dialogue: Well, I'd say you did pretty great!
trans: 好吧，我会说你做得很好！

Original: Reynn:Yeah, I mean, that fire Mirage? You doused it in one fell swoop!
Dialogue: Yeah, I mean, that fire Mirage? You doused it in one fell swoop!
trans: 是的，我的意思是，幻影之火？

Original: Lann:Right? You've gotnothingto be scared of.
Dialogue: Right? You've got nothing to be scared of.

Original: Reynn:"Blow it out, baby"? That's your sage advice? She's not struggling with a fear of birthday cakes.
Dialogue: "Blow it out, baby"? That's your sage advice? She's not struggling with a fear of birthday cakes.

Original: Lann:She's not?
Dialogue: She's not?

Original: Reynn:No, dude.
Dialogue: No, dude.

Original: Lann:Then... Oh! How 'bout this? Maybe she needs a party to cheer her up!
Dialogue: Then... Oh! How 'bout this? Maybe she needs a party to cheer her up!

Original: Reynn:What aboutanythingthat you're doing right now could possibly cheer her up?
Dialogue: What about anything that you're doing right now could possibly cheer her up?
trans: 你现在正在做的任何事情都可能让她振作起来吗？

Original: Tama:It's the-cooler thanyou.
Dialogue: It's the-cooler than you.

Original: Rydia:Hee hee! Ha ha ha!
Dialogue: Hee hee! Ha ha ha!

Original: Lann:Huh? I am not!
Dialogue: Huh? I am not!

Original: Reynn:Yeah, you're way past weird.
Dialogue: Yeah, you're way past weird.

Original: Tama:Completely beyond the-redemption.
Dialogue: Completely beyond the-redemption.

Original: Rydia:Ha ha! So, shall we?
Dialogue: Ha ha! So, shall we?

Original: Reynn:Wh-what? But Rydia!
Dialogue: Wh-what? But Rydia!

Original: Lann:Go home. You've got nothing to prove. We'll let you know if we find anything.
Dialogue: Go home. You've got nothing to prove. We'll let you know if we find anything.

Original: Rydia:Really? How will you get past that wall of fire?
Dialogue: Really? How will you get past that wall of fire?

Original: Reynn:Oh, uh...
Dialogue: Oh, uh...

Original: Rydia:Look. I'll return to NibelheimafterI put the fire out for you.
Dialogue: Look. I'll return to Nibelheim after I put the fire out for you.

Original: Lann:Yeah! Reasonlicious.
Dialogue: Yeah! Reasonlicious.

Original: Reynn:You're sure?
Dialogue: You're sure?

Original: Rydia:Yes. Come on.
Dialogue: Yes. Come on.

Original: Lann:Uh, hey. You okay?
Dialogue: Uh, hey. You okay?

Original: Rydia:.....!
Lann:Aw, yeah!
Dialogue: Aw, yeah!

Original: Rydia:...I'm fine. I just got a little worked up...and I couldn't keep my balance.
Dialogue: ...I'm fine. I just got a little worked up...and I couldn't keep my balance.

Original: Rydia:All right then. I should return to town. I hate to leave...
Dialogue: All right then. I should return to town. I hate to leave...

Original: Lann:Nah, you've done plenty for us.
Dialogue: Nah, you've done plenty for us.

Original: Tama:See you the-next tama!
Dialogue: See you the-next tama!

Original: Lann:Hey, wait! When's the next tama, Tama?
Dialogue: Hey, wait! When's the next tama, Tama?

Original: Tama:Oh! Maybe it's the-sometime tama-rah!
Dialogue: Oh! Maybe it's the-sometime tama-rah!

Original: Reynn:Okay, I think their brains are fried. Safe travels, Rydia.
Dialogue: Okay, I think their brains are fried. Safe travels, Rydia.
trans: 好吧，我认为他们的大脑被炸了。

Original: Rydia:No, thank you. Well, so long!
Dialogue: No, thank you. Well, so long!

Original: Reynn:Okay, let's press on, Lann.
Dialogue: Okay, let's press on, Lann.

Original: Lann:Right. We've got a key to find.
Dialogue: Right. We've got a key to find.

Original: Tama:Best of the-luck on your adventure!
Dialogue: Best of the-luck on your adventure!

Original: Reynn:Ha ha. You're coming too, Tama. Nice try.
Dialogue: Ha ha. You're coming too, Tama. Nice try.

Original: Lann:I reeeally don't know about this place.
Dialogue: I reeeally don't know about this place.
trans: 我真的不知道这个地方。

Original: Reynn:I do. I know that it's really bad.
Dialogue: I do. I know that it's really bad.

Original: Tama:We can't the-give up now!
Dialogue: We can't the-give up now!

Original: Reynn:Technically we can, but let's get this over with.
Dialogue: Technically we can, but let's get this over with.
trans: 从技术上讲我们可以，但让我们结束吧。

Original: Lann:Whoa! Is that the key?
Dialogue: Whoa! Is that the key?

Original: Tama:What do you the-know? Now that was a piece of the-cake!
Dialogue: What do you the-know? Now that was a piece of the-cake!

Original: Lann:Hey! Give us back that key, right now!
Dialogue: Hey! Give us back that key, right now!

Original: Reynn:So much for a piece of cake, I guess...
Dialogue: So much for a piece of cake, I guess...

Original: Lann:Maybe he'll cough it up if we thump him on the back!
Dialogue: Maybe he'll cough it up if we thump him on the back!
trans: 如果我们拍打他的背，他也许会咳出来！

Original: Reynn:Give it a shot.
Dialogue: Give it a shot.

Original: Tama:Yeah, the-do it, do it!
Dialogue: Yeah, the-do it, do it!

Original: Lann:Okay! Wait, whereisits back?
Dialogue: Okay! Wait, where is its back?

Original: Lann:Check it out! Dude! It's just like the prophecy said!
Dialogue: Check it out! Dude! It's just like the prophecy said!

Original: Reynn:I guess...
Dialogue: I guess...

Original: Lann:What's up? You don't seem very happy.
Dialogue: What's up? You don't seem very happy.

Original: Reynn:No, it's not that at all, I just...
Dialogue: No, it's not that at all, I just...
trans: 不，根本不是那样，我只是……

Original: Reynn:Why'd it...get so quiet all of a sudden?
Dialogue: Why'd it...get so quiet all of a sudden?

Original: Tama:Is it 'cause we gave that bomb the old heave-the-ho?
Dialogue: Is it 'cause we gave that bomb the old heave-the-ho?
trans: 是因为我们给了那个炸弹旧的 heave-the-ho 吗？

Original: Lann:Ah! What now? An earthquake?!
Dialogue: Ah! What now? An earthquake?!

Original: Reynn:Whoa! It must be a big one!
Dialogue: Whoa! It must be a big one!

Original: Lann:Wh...what the honking HAWWWWWWNK!
Dialogue: Wh...what the honking HAWWWWWWNK!

Original: Reynn:Oh no. Anything but another FLOOD!
Dialogue: Oh no. Anything but another FLOOD!

Original: Tama:Oh! Mayday! The-mayday!
Dialogue: Oh! Mayday! The-mayday!

Original: ???:Chapter 12 - Ribbit Jiggle Panic
Dialogue: Chapter 12 - Ribbit Jiggle Panic

Original: Lann:Make that adoublejelly sandwich!
Dialogue: Make that a double jelly sandwich!
trans: 把它做成双层果冻三明治！

Original: Tama:We're...gonna need the-therapy after this.
Dialogue: We're...gonna need the-therapy after this.

Original: Reynn:Ugh, please... No more cosmic flushing.
Dialogue: Ugh, please... No more cosmic flushing.
trans: 呃，拜托......不要再宇宙冲洗了。

Original: Lann:...Where are we now?
Dialogue: ...Where are we now?

Original: Reynn:I don't think we're in Nibelheim anymore. Not by a long shot.
Dialogue: I don't think we're in Nibelheim anymore. Not by a long shot.
trans: 我认为我们不再在尼布尔海姆了。

Original: Reynn:For starters, why don't we take a took around?
Dialogue: For starters, why don't we take a took around?
trans: 对于初学者，我们为什么不四处走走呢？

Original: Lann:Mom bombs! That is one deep swamp.
Dialogue: Mom bombs! That is one deep swamp.

Original: Reynn:Maybe we shouldn't go this way after all...
Dialogue: Maybe we shouldn't go this way after all...
trans: 也许我们终究不应该走这条路……

Original: Toad:Ribbit! Ribby ra-rib! Ribba-ribbit!
Dialogue: Ribbit! Ribby ra-rib! Ribba-ribbit!

Original: Reynn:What's with this toad?
Dialogue: What's with this toad?

Original: Lann:Is it a Mirage? 'Cause it doesn't act like one.
Dialogue: Is it a Mirage? 'Cause it doesn't act like one.

Original: Toad:Ribbit! Ribbit. Ribbity ribbity ribbit!
Dialogue: Ribbit! Ribbit. Ribbity ribbity ribbit!

Original: Tama:Ribbit? Ribbity-ribbit? The-rib?
Dialogue: Ribbit? Ribbity-ribbit? The-rib?

Original: Toad:Ribbit? Ribbit! Ribba ribba ribbit.
Dialogue: Ribbit? Ribbit! Ribba ribba ribbit.

Original: Tama:Ribbee! The-bib.
Dialogue: Ribbee! The-bib.

Original: Lann:What? You speak toadese?
Dialogue: What? You speak toadese?

Original: Tama:Of the-course I do. Listen, you can tell from his accent that he's been the-toad-cursed.
Dialogue: Of the-course I do. Listen, you can tell from his accent that he's been the-toad-cursed.

Original: Reynn:He's a GUY?
Dialogue: He's a GUY?

Original: Lann:They haveaccents?
Dialogue: They have accents?

Original: Toad:Ribbit! Ribbi-rit. Ribbit!
Dialogue: Ribbit! Ribbi-rit. Ribbit!

Original: Reynn:What'd he say?
Dialogue: What'd he say?

Original: Tama:From what I gather, it sounds the-like that golden toad over there is the 'phibian that put the curse on him.
Dialogue: From what I gather, it sounds the-like that golden toad over there is the 'phibian that put the curse on him.
trans: 据我所知，那边的金蟾蜍听起来像是“对他下了诅咒的菲比亚人”。

Original: Lann:Oh, so all we have to do is defeat it.
Dialogue: Oh, so all we have to do is defeat it.
trans: 哦，所以我们所要做的就是打败它。

Original: Tama:That's the-correct. First off, you need to the-imprism it the same as always.
Dialogue: That's the-correct. First off, you need to the-imprism it the same as always.

Original: Lann:Okay. We got this.
Dialogue: Okay. We got this.

Original: Reynn:Carefulyoudon't get toad-cursed.
Dialogue: Careful you don't get toad-cursed.

Original: Lann:Huh? You mean you're not coming?
Dialogue: Huh? You mean you're not coming?

Original: Reynn:Well, it's game over if webothgo full toad, right?
Dialogue: Well, it's game over if we both go full toad, right?
trans: 好吧，如果我们都吃饱了，游戏就结束了，对吧？

Original: Reynn:Are you gonna nab that toad or what?
Dialogue: Are you gonna nab that toad or what?
trans: 你是要抓住那只蟾蜍还是什么？

Original: Lann:Ribbit, ribbity-ribbit, ribbiiit, ribbit!
Dialogue: Ribbit, ribbity-ribbit, ribbiiit, ribbit!

Original: Tama:Lann! Where did you the-learn to talk like that? You need to go the-wash your mouth out with a bar of soap!
Dialogue: Lann! Where did you the-learn to talk like that? You need to go the-wash your mouth out with a bar of soap!

Original: Lann:What?! Dude, what did I say?!
Dialogue: What?! Dude, what did I say?!

Original: Snow:Awww, ha! Look who's back, baby!
Dialogue: Awww, ha! Look who's back, baby!

Original: Reynn:I guessyouare.
Dialogue: I guess you are.

Original: Snow:You guys seriously just saved my life. Oh, the name's Snow.
Dialogue: You guys seriously just saved my life. Oh, the name's Snow.

Original: Lann:Dude, I have no idea what's wrong with you, but as long as you're happy.
Dialogue: Dude, I have no idea what's wrong with you, but as long as you're happy.
trans: 伙计，我不知道你怎么了，但只要你开心就好。

Original: Tama:Did Lann just find someone he can talk the-down to? Never the-thought I'd see the day.
Dialogue: Did Lann just find someone he can talk the-down to? Never the-thought I'd see the day.
trans: 兰恩是不是刚刚找到了一个可以与之交谈的人？

Original: Snow:So, what's your deal? Where ya from?
Dialogue: So, what's your deal? Where ya from?

Original: Snow:You say you got swept here all the way from Nibelheim?
Dialogue: You say you got swept here all the way from Nibelheim?
trans: 你说你从尼布尔海姆一路被扫地出门？

Original: Lann:I know, it's crazy! I guess...we're getting kinda pro at it?
Dialogue: I know, it's crazy! I guess...we're getting kinda pro at it?

Original: Reynn:I don'twantto be a pro at it...
Dialogue: I don't want to be a pro at it...
trans: 我不想成为这方面的专家...

Original: Tama:Anyway, it seems we're the-stuck here. All the goop around here makes it the-hard to look for a way out.
Dialogue: Anyway, it seems we're the-stuck here. All the goop around here makes it the-hard to look for a way out.
trans: 无论如何，看来我们被困在这里了。

Original: Snow:Oh yeah. Well, you've got that right. One false step andwhsssht,you're history.
Dialogue: Oh yeah. Well, you've got that right. One false step and whsssht, you're history.

Original: Lann:Okay, then how didyouget out here, Snow?
Dialogue: Okay, then how did you get out here, Snow?
trans: 好的，那你是怎么出来的，斯诺？

Original: Snow:Heh. Just, like, THIS!
Dialogue: Heh. Just, like, THIS!

Original: Lann:Whoa! Cool idea!
Dialogue: Whoa! Cool idea!

Original: Reynn:Wait a minute. Are you a summoner?!
Dialogue: Wait a minute. Are you a summoner?!

Original: Snow:Wish I could say I was...but no.
Dialogue: Wish I could say I was...but no.
trans: 希望我能说我是……但不是。

Original: Snow:But...that's not important.
Dialogue: But...that's not important.

Original: Reynn:How about you? Are you still gonna..."butt-kick the Big Jiggle" or whatever it was?
Dialogue: How about you? Are you still gonna..."butt-kick the Big Jiggle" or whatever it was?

Original: Snow:You know it! It shouldn't be too far from where we are now.
Dialogue: You know it! It shouldn't be too far from where we are now.

Original: Lann:So it's like a Mirage?
Dialogue: So it's like a Mirage?

Original: Snow:Yup! Me and Jiggles have got some history.
Dialogue: Yup! Me and Jiggles have got some history.

Original: Lann:I gotcha. Then maybe we can help you out.
Dialogue: I gotcha. Then maybe we can help you out.

Original: Snow:Uh, really?
Dialogue: Uh, really?

Original: Reynn:We're sort of on a journey to round up Mirages anyway.
Dialogue: We're sort of on a journey to round up Mirages anyway.
trans: 无论如何，我们都在踏上收集 Mirages 的旅程。

Original: Snow:Ahh, I gotcha now. Well, let's team up then. That stupid Big Jiggle will never know what hit it!
Dialogue: Ahh, I gotcha now. Well, let's team up then. That stupid Big Jiggle will never know what hit it!

Original: Lann:Why do all the Mirages here like popping out at us?
Dialogue: Why do all the Mirages here like popping out at us?
trans: 为什么这里所有的海市蜃楼都喜欢突然出现在我们面前？

Original: Tama:It must be the-part of their disposition.
Dialogue: It must be the-part of their disposition.
trans: 这一定是他们性情的一部分。

Original: Lann:Too bad. I got here first!
Dialogue: Too bad. I got here first!

Original: Tama:Uh, yeah. You the-tell 'em.
Dialogue: Uh, yeah. You the-tell 'em.

Original: Reynn:Mirages, be warned. Dis-position is Lann's position.
Dialogue: Mirages, be warned. Dis-position is Lann's position.

Original: Snow:Okay! Today you're gonna wish you never started jiggling!
Dialogue: Okay! Today you're gonna wish you never started jiggling!

Original: Tama:Ah, aaaaaah!
Dialogue: Ah, aaaaaah!

Original: Lann:It's huge!
Dialogue: It's huge!

Original: Reynn:Aha ha ha... Snow, which part of this thing is the butt?
Dialogue: Aha ha ha... Snow, which part of this thing is the butt?
trans: 啊哈哈哈哈……小雪，这东西哪一部分是屁股？

Original: Snow:Oh, it'sallbutt!
Dialogue: Oh, it's all butt!

Original: Lann:This mountain is so majestic, and...jiggly!
Dialogue: This mountain is so majestic, and...jiggly!
trans: 这座山好雄伟，而且……摇摇晃晃！

Original: Reynn:Do you realize we're not fighting a mountain...?
Dialogue: Do you realize we're not fighting a mountain...?
trans: 你知道我们不是在和一座山战斗吗……？

Original: Tama:My the-eyes! It's so the-shiny!
Dialogue: My the-eyes! It's so the-shiny!

Original: Lann:Well, we beat it but, yeah... I don't feel like we actuallyreallybeat it.
Dialogue: Well, we beat it but, yeah... I don't feel like we actually really beat it.
trans: 好吧，我们打败了它，但是，是的……我不觉得我们真的打败了它。

Original: Reynn:I know. It's like we're right back to square one, except...nothing about that thing was square.
Dialogue: I know. It's like we're right back to square one, except...nothing about that thing was square.

Original: Snow:I guess we just didn't kick it hard enough.
Dialogue: I guess we just didn't kick it hard enough.
trans: 我想我们只是踢得不够狠。

Original: Reynn:Snow, what exactly do you have against it again?
Dialogue: Snow, what exactly do you have against it again?
trans: 斯诺，你到底有什么反对的？

Original: Snow:If I don't keep it in line, it just grows and grows.
Dialogue: If I don't keep it in line, it just grows and grows.
trans: 如果我不让它保持一致，它就会越来越大。

Original: Lann:Sounds like a big, big, BIG nuisance to me.
Dialogue: Sounds like a big, big, BIG nuisance to me.
trans: 听起来对我来说是一个很大，很大，很大的麻烦。

Original: Snow:Well, thanks to you, I was able to smack it around a lot more than usual today.
Dialogue: Well, thanks to you, I was able to smack it around a lot more than usual today.
trans: 好吧，多亏了你，我今天比平时打得更多。

Original: Lann:You know, even for a a guy who slings around ice magic, he was surprisingly chill.
Dialogue: You know, even for a a guy who slings around ice magic, he was surprisingly chill.
trans: 要知道，即使是一个玩弄冰魔法的家伙，他也冷得惊人。

Original: Reynn:Yeah, I'll say. So, you ready to kiss this place good-bye?
Dialogue: Yeah, I'll say. So, you ready to kiss this place good-bye?

Original: Tama:I hope that the rest is the-easy going.
Dialogue: I hope that the rest is the-easy going.
trans: 我希望剩下的是容易的。

Original: ???:Chapter 13 - Castle in the Desert
Dialogue: Chapter 13 - Castle in the Desert

Original: Reynn:Yeah? What?
Dialogue: Yeah? What?

Original: Lann:This whole "adventuring" thing is hard.
Dialogue: This whole "adventuring" thing is hard.
trans: 这整个“冒险”的事情很难。

Original: Reynn:Well, the word "adventure"
Dialogue: Well, the word "adventure"—

Original: Lann:Thanks for that uplifting bit of trivia.
Dialogue: Thanks for that uplifting bit of trivia.
trans: 感谢那些令人振奋的琐事。

Original: Tama:Wait! I the-hear some activity over thata-the-way. I think we're not far from a place to the-rest!
Dialogue: Wait! I the-hear some activity over thata-the-way. I think we're not far from a place to the-rest!

Original: Lann:Finally, a town.
Dialogue: Finally, a town.

Original: Reynn:We can't go in.
Dialogue: We can't go in.

Original: Lann:What? Why not?
Dialogue: What? Why not?

Original: Reynn:It's another Federation town. We'd better steer clear.
Dialogue: It's another Federation town. We'd better steer clear.

Original: Tama:We don't want to run the-into those creeps.
Dialogue: We don't want to run the-into those creeps.
trans: 我们不想遇到那些令人毛骨悚然的人。

Original: Reynn:Excuse me. Would you mind if we rested here a bit?
Dialogue: Excuse me. Would you mind if we rested here a bit?

Original: Caravan Member:Sure! You can stay just as long as you like.
Dialogue: Sure! You can stay just as long as you like.

Original: Caravan Member:Here. Some sunscreen. Help yourself.
Dialogue: Here. Some sunscreen. Help yourself.

Original: Reynn:Oh, you don't mind?
Dialogue: Oh, you don't mind?

Original: Caravan Member:Please! Go crazy!
Dialogue: Please! Go crazy!

Original: Lann:Sunscreen force fields...applied and activated!
Dialogue: Sunscreen force fields...applied and activated!

Original: Reynn:Thank you so much!
Dialogue: Thank you so much!

Original: Lann:Now I'm all lathered up, I can smell 'em.
Dialogue: Now I'm all lathered up, I can smell 'em.
trans: 现在我全身都起泡了，我能闻到它们的味道了。

Original: Reynn:Smell what?
Dialogue: Smell what?

Original: Lann:Mirages! Over there!
Dialogue: Mirages! Over there!

Original: Tama:Over the-where? To the north?
Dialogue: Over the-where? To the north?

Original: Lann:Despite the harsh desert climate, Mirages here are full of life.
Dialogue: Despite the harsh desert climate, Mirages here are full of life.
trans: 尽管沙漠气候恶劣，这里的海市蜃楼却充满生机。

Original: Reynn:When did we step into a documentary?
Dialogue: When did we step into a documentary?
trans: 我们什么时候踏入纪录片？

Original: Lann:Uh...a docu-what?
Dialogue: Uh...a docu-what?

Original: Tama:A Bahamutian the-soldier!
Dialogue: A Bahamutian the-soldier!

Original: Reynn:But why here?!
Dialogue: But why here?!

Original: Lann:Um, Reynn? That creepy noise that we've been hearingI think it's getting the opposite of not less quieter.
Dialogue: Um, Reynn? That creepy noise that we've been hearing—I think it's getting the opposite of not less quieter.

Original: Reynn:'Scuse me? I'm not even going to attempt to untangle that statement...
Dialogue: 'Scuse me? I'm not even going to attempt to untangle that statement...

Original: Tama:In other the-words, this isn't going to end the-well...
Dialogue: In other the-words, this isn't going to end the-well...
trans: 换句话说，这不会就此结束...

Original: Lann:Huh? The sky's gone all orangey.
Dialogue: Huh? The sky's gone all orangey.

Original: Reynn:It's getting late. We're taking too long.
Dialogue: It's getting late. We're taking too long.

Original: Tama:We'd better get the-clear of here before the sun goes down.
Dialogue: We'd better get the-clear of here before the sun goes down.
trans: 我们最好在太阳下山之前离开这里。

Original: Lann:Oh my gosh... How many of them are wriggling around down there?
Dialogue: Oh my gosh... How many of them are wriggling around down there?
trans: 哦，我的天啊……有多少人在下面扭来扭去？

Original: Reynn:Well, whatever the answer is...DON'T TELL ME!
Dialogue: Well, whatever the answer is...DON'T TELL ME!
trans: 好吧，不管答案是什么……别告诉我！

Original: Lann:These things have been under us the whole time?
Dialogue: These things have been under us the whole time?
trans: 这些东西一直在我们手下？

Original: Tama:More than you can possibly the-imagine.
Dialogue: More than you can possibly the-imagine.

Original: Reynn:Aaah! I said don't tell me about it!
Dialogue: Aaah! I said don't tell me about it!

Original: ???:Are you trying to get killed?!
Dialogue: Are you trying to get killed?!

Original: Lightning:I won't make it...!
Dialogue: I won't make it...!

Original: Lightning:What just Whatever, I'll take it!
Dialogue: What just— Whatever, I'll take it!
trans: 什么只是——不管怎样，我会接受的！

Original: Reynn:I don't know what you did, but thanks.
Dialogue: I don't know what you did, but thanks.
trans: 我不知道你做了什么，但谢谢。

Original: Lightning:Save it for later. The longer we all stay out here, the shorter we'll live.
Dialogue: Save it for later. The longer we all stay out here, the shorter we'll live.

Original: Lann:Dude, what?
Dialogue: Dude, what?

Original: Lightning:Come on!
Dialogue: Come on!

Original: Reynn:Uh, right!
Dialogue: Uh, right!

Original: Lann:Got it!
Dialogue: Got it!

Original: Tama:The-run like the wind!
Dialogue: The-run like the wind!

Original: Caravan Member:I just want to forget those sand worms ever existed...
Dialogue: I just want to forget those sand worms ever existed...
trans: 我只想忘记那些曾经存在过的沙虫……

Original: Caravan Member:The moon is a thing of beauty tonight.
Dialogue: The moon is a thing of beauty tonight.

Original: Caravan Member:You can always find refuge from the desert here. Make sure you rest up before attempting to cross.
Dialogue: You can always find refuge from the desert here. Make sure you rest up before attempting to cross.
trans: 您总能在这里找到远离沙漠的避难所。

Original: Lightning:Surprising. I never thought the Jiants from the Hills would have so much trouble crossing a desert.
Dialogue: Surprising. I never thought the Jiants from the Hills would have so much trouble crossing a desert.

Original: Lann:Oh! So then you've heard of us.
Dialogue: Oh! So then you've heard of us.

Original: Reynn:Why are you so happy about that? Trust me, we donotwant fame.
Dialogue: Why are you so happy about that? Trust me, we do not want fame.

Original: Hospitable Woman:This'll warm you right up.
Dialogue: This'll warm you right up.
trans: 这会让你马上暖和起来。

Original: Lann:Oh. Thanks!
Dialogue: Oh. Thanks!

Original: Lightning:The keys from the prophecy? Interesting... That explains some things.
Dialogue: The keys from the prophecy? Interesting... That explains some things.

Original: Reynn:So you've heard of them? I don't suppose you can tell us more?
Dialogue: So you've heard of them? I don't suppose you can tell us more?

Original: Lightning:...There are four: earth, fire, water, and shadow, if I remember correctly.
Dialogue: ...There are four earth, fire, water, and shadow, if I remember correctly.
trans: ……如果我没记错的话，有地、火、水、影四种。

Original: Lann:You wouldn't also happen to know where the keys are hidden?
Dialogue: You wouldn't also happen to know where the keys are hidden?
trans: 你不会也碰巧知道钥匙藏在哪里吧？

Original: Reynn:Is something wrong?
Dialogue: Is something wrong?

Original: Lightning:Oh... Sorry. I've never heard exactly where the keys might be hidden.
Dialogue: Oh... Sorry. I've never heard exactly where the keys might be hidden.

Original: Hospitable Woman:I might know something about that.
Dialogue: I might know something about that.

Original: Hospitable Woman:The Key of Earth...lies in the "cradle of mako's light."
Dialogue: The Key of Earth...lies in the "cradle of mako's light."
trans: 大地之钥……就在“魔晃之光的摇篮”中。

Original: Lann:Ohhh! That sounds nice and specific.
Dialogue: Ohhh! That sounds nice and specific.

Original: Lightning:Wait. Is that from the Crimson Prophecy's missing verse?
Dialogue: Wait. Is that from the Crimson Prophecy's missing verse?

Original: Hospitable Woman:Yes. You know much, traveler.
Dialogue: Yes. You know much, traveler.

Original: Reynn:Time out. What is this "missing verse"?
Dialogue: Time out. What is this "missing verse"?

Original: Lightning:They say that part of the original prophecy was omitted from subsequent copies.
Dialogue: They say that part of the original prophecy was omitted from subsequent copies.
trans: 他们说，后来的副本中省略了部分原始预言。

Original: Hospitable Woman:Oh, I haven't read it myself. I heard it from someone who has.
Dialogue: Oh, I haven't read it myself. I heard it from someone who has.

Original: Lann:And Bahamut's castle? You, uh...probably don't know that much.
Dialogue: And Bahamut's castle? You, uh...probably don't know that much.

Original: Reynn:How would she know wherethatis?
Dialogue: How would she know where that is?

Original: Hospitable Woman:I don'tknow...but therearewhispers.
Dialogue: I don't know...but there are whispers.
trans: 我不知道……但有窃窃私语。

Original: Lann:Seriously?!
Dialogue: Seriously?!

Original: Hospitable Woman:This is merely a rumor, but...
Dialogue: This is merely a rumor, but...

Original: Reynn:Heralds... So then, the king who founded Bahamut.
Dialogue: Heralds... So then, the king who founded Bahamut.
trans: 传令官……那么，创建巴哈姆特的国王。

Original: Lann:Cool! So, all we have to do is get those four keys, and then haul hiney over to the Crystal Tower, am I right?
Dialogue: Cool! So, all we have to do is get those four keys, and then haul hiney over to the Crystal Tower, am I right?

Original: Reynn:Yeah, from the sound of it...
Dialogue: Yeah, from the sound of it...

Original: Lann:*Yaaawwwn* All this reassuring info is making me sleepy.
Dialogue: *Yaaawwwn* All this reassuring info is making me sleepy.
trans: *Yaaawwwn* 所有这些令人安心的信息让我昏昏欲睡。

Original: Reynn:*Yaaawwwn* Don't yawn, Lann. You're making me yawn too.
Dialogue: *Yaaawwwn* Don't yawn, Lann. You're making me yawn too.

Original: Lann:What do you say we just...turn in here for the day...
Dialogue: What do you say we just...turn in here for the day...
trans: 你说我们只是...今天在这里转...

Original: Reynn:Yeah, okay...
Dialogue: Yeah, okay...

Original: Lann:Good night, Reynn...
Dialogue: Good night, Reynn...

Original: Reynn:Good night...
Dialogue: Good night...

Original: Reynn:Wh...what is...that noise?
Dialogue: Wh...what is...that noise?

Original: Lann:Nnn... Now what...
Dialogue: Nnn... Now what...

Original: Lightning:Agh?!
Dialogue: Agh?!

Original: Reynn:That chain...
Dialogue: That chain...

Original: Lann:The Federation... What aretheydoing here?
Dialogue: The Federation... What are they doing here?
trans: 联邦...他们在这里做什么？

Original: Lightning:We were careless... The drinks...last night...
Dialogue: We were careless... The drinks...last night...

Original: Reynn:What? They were
Dialogue: What? They were—

Original: Lann:Dude, my body... I can barely...
Dialogue: Dude, my body... I can barely...
trans: 伙计，我的身体……我几乎不能……

Original: ???:No heroics, please.
Dialogue: No heroics, please.

Original: Edgar:Hey now. That is certainly no way for us to treat a lady.
Dialogue: Hey now. That is certainly no way for us to treat a lady.

Original: Plumed Knight:Heh. Rubbish.
Dialogue: Heh. Rubbish.

Original: Lann:Who's the knight?
Dialogue: Who's the knight?

Original: Reynn:The Federation. Who else could it be?
Dialogue: The Federation. Who else could it be?

Original: Edgar:I believe our arrangement...said the Jiants were mine to attend to.
Dialogue: I believe our arrangement...said the Jiants were mine to attend to.
trans: 我相信我们的安排...说 Jiants 是我要照顾的。

Original: Reynn:"Attend to"? That sounds...awfully churlish to me...!
Dialogue: "Attend to"? That sounds...awfully churlish to me...!

Original: Edgar:Ah, but no. See, you may be a Jiant, but my attention...I save forrealgrown-ups.
Dialogue: Ah, but no. See, you may be a Jiant, but my attention...I save for real grown-ups.

Original: Lann:That's it! Nobody talks to her like that!
Dialogue: That's it! Nobody talks to her like that!

Original: Reynn:Lann!
Dialogue: Lann!

Original: Edgar:Let's try to keep things civil, if you don't mind. Please don't struggle.
Dialogue: Let's try to keep things civil, if you don't mind. Please don't struggle.
trans: 如果你不介意的话，让我们尽量保持文明。

Original: Lann:Wh-what is going on?
Dialogue: Wh-what is going on?

Original: Reynn:I...I don't know...
Dialogue: I...I don't know...

Original: ???:Chapter 14 - Lost Powers
Dialogue: Chapter 14 - Lost Powers

Original: Lann:Sis, are you okay?
Dialogue: Sis, are you okay?

Original: Reynn:I think so... Areyouokay?
Dialogue: I think so... Are you okay?

Original: Lann:Yeah... Except...
Dialogue: Yeah... Except...

Original: Lann:What did they do? ...Ow!
Dialogue: What did they do? ...Ow!

Original: Male Lilikin (2):......
Reynn:Excuse me. Do you know where we are?
Dialogue: Excuse me. Do you know where we are?

Original: Man in Rags:Huh? Jiants, eh? Heh. Now what did you do to get thrown intothissorry place?
Dialogue: Huh? Jiants, eh? Heh. Now what did you do to get thrown into this sorry place?

Original: Lann:Dude,prison?For real?
Dialogue: Dude, prison? For real?

Original: Man in Rags:Well, they call it prison, but it's more like a death sentence.
Dialogue: Well, they call it prison, but it's more like a death sentence.
trans: 好吧，他们称之为监狱，但它更像是死刑。

Original: Reynn:That can't be! Theremustbe a way out of here!
Dialogue: That can't be! There must be a way out of here!

Original: Man in Rags:Oh, wouldn't that be nice? But you can forget about it.
Dialogue: Oh, wouldn't that be nice? But you can forget about it.

Original: Lann:Sentient machines?
Dialogue: Sentient machines?

Original: Reynn:They're not Mirages?
Dialogue: They're not Mirages?

Original: Man in Rags:How's a lowly prisoner like me to know? But I suppose that they must not be.
Dialogue: How's a lowly prisoner like me to know? But I suppose that they must not be.
trans: 我一个卑微的囚犯怎么会知道？

Original: Man in Rags:Are you two heading out? Then you'd better watch your back.
Dialogue: Are you two heading out? Then you'd better watch your back.

Original: Lann:What'n the...
Dialogue: What'n the...

Original: Man in Rags:That would be the castle submerging.
Dialogue: That would be the castle submerging.

Original: Reynn:Now that I think of it, the castledidseem to appear out of nowhere.
Dialogue: Now that I think of it, the castle did seem to appear out of nowhere.
trans: 现在想起来，这座城堡似乎是凭空出现的。

Original: Man in Rags:I heard the first time they poked around here, the castle plowed forward, and they ended up having to redraw all the maps. Least that's the story.
Dialogue: I heard the first time they poked around here, the castle plowed forward, and they ended up having to redraw all the maps. Least that's the story.
trans: 我听说他们第一次在这里四处闲逛时，城堡向前推进，结果他们不得不重新绘制所有地图。

Original: Lann:Nngh... Aaah!
Dialogue: Nngh... Aaah!

Original: Reynn:Huh? She's not answering?
Dialogue: Huh? She's not answering?

Original: Lann:No way, dude. You don't think...
